Extent of this text:
1. Prakaraṇa: Vairāgya (1,1-1,32),
2. Prakaraṇa: Mumukṣuvyavahāra, first chapters missing (2,5.5-2,20.13),
3. Prakaraṇa: Utpatti, fragments (3,1.1-41; 3,3.13-3,12.4; 3,13.50-3,16.41),
4. Prakaraṇa: Sthiti, fragments (4,1.1-4,24.19, 4,25.12-4,33.26).

projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the resp attribute identifying the agency.

refsDecl.p:
A reference is given in the xml:id attributes consisting of
a pragmatic abbreviation of the title: Mokṣopāyaṭīkā = MT,
the number of the prakaraṇa in arabic numerals,
the number of the sarga in arabic numerals,
the number of the verse or prose paragraph in arabic numerals.

note.p: tasmai prasiddhāya | viśvātmane sarvasāratvena sthitatvāt sarveṣām ātmabhūtāyārthāt paramātmane namaḥ | aparimitāyāṃ tatsattāyām parimitasvasattānyagbhāvarūpaḥ prahvībhāvaḥ astu | tatsattāyām eva svasattāṃ līnām bhāvayāmīti yāvat | tasmai kasmai | avabhāsātmā bāhyāntarālokagatanānāvidhabāhyāntarapadārthavṛndaviṣayajñānasārabhūtaḥN11: °ālo(ga)ka° | yaḥ viśvātmā | avabhāti pratyakṣam eva sphurati | yataḥ pratyakṣaṃ sphurantaḥ nānābhāsāḥ vicāraviṣayīkṛtāḥ santaḥ anirvācyatāsvarūpāyām paramātmatāyām eva viśrāmyanti | tataḥŚ4: tat(aḥ)*o* nānāvabhāsāvabhāsenaN11: °bhāne°; Ś4: °bhā(-)*s*e° paramātmaivāvabhātīti bhāvaḥ | yaḥ kathambhūtaḥ | vibhuḥ vyāpakaḥ | kutra | me parimitapramātṛtāsādanena cinmātrarūpāparimitapramātṛbhāvāc cyutasyāta eva paricchinnavācakāsmacchabdavācyatāṃ gatasya parimitapramātuḥ | bahiḥ bāhye | ahantāviṣayatām anīteŚ4: (a)*ā*nī° pradeśe iti yāvat | punaḥ kutra | antaś ca ahantāviṣayatāṃ nīte pradeśe ca | bahiḥ kiṃrūpe | divi samastasurādhārabhūtasvargalokarūpeN11: °ādhā*ra*bhū° | tathā bhūmau samastanarādinānāvidhabhūtādhārabhūtabhūlokarūpe | tathā tadvat | ākāśe śūnyamātrādhārabhūtākāśalokasvarūpe | etena caturdaśabhuvanānāṃ grahaṇaṃ jñeyaṃ | antaś ca kiṃrūpe | divi dyotanamātrasvarūpasvapnāvasthārūpe | bhūmau sthūlatvasādṛśyāj jāgradavasthārūpe | tathā tadvat | ākāśe śūnyamātrādhāratvasādṛśyāt suṣuptyavasthāsvarūpe | atra ca paramātmanaḥ vyāpakatvaṃ śaktiprādhānyenopādānatayāŚ4: °pr*ā*dhā° sthitatvāt svaprādhānyena sākṣitayā sthitatvāc ceti dvividhaṃ jñeyam | evam abhīṣṭasamu-citadevatānamaskāralakṣaṇam maṅgalaṃ kṛtvā uddhariṣyamāṇasyāsya granthasyādhikāryādyanubandhacatuṣṭayaṃ vaktukāmaḥ sa evoddhṛtikāraḥ abhidheyasambandhaprayojanāny arthāt sūcayan adhikārinirūpaṇaṃ sākṣātkaroti ||

note.p: *N11, Ś4: śrīvālmīkir uvāca||śrībhagavatkṛpākaṭākṣapātrībhūtasya yasya puruṣasya | ahamparimitapramātṛrūpaḥ aham baddhaḥ svātmabhāvena niścitadehopayogibhogajālāsaktacittaḥ | asmi katham iti śeṣaḥ | proktajālānāsaktacittaḥ kathaṃ syāmŚ4: syāt bhave-yam | iti evam |niścayaḥ manasi satatam anusandhānaṃ | syāt | saḥŚ4: sa puruṣaḥ | asminn uddhariṣyamāṇe mokṣopāyākhye granthe | adhikāravān syāt | tasyaivedaṃ śāstraṃ vicāraṇīyam ity arthaḥ | saḥŚ4: sa kathambhūtaḥ | nātyantaṃ tajjñaḥ nātyantatajjñaḥ | muktikāmatvena samyagjñānarahita 4ity arthaḥ | samyagjñānī hi muktim api na kāṅkṣati | kāṅkṣāmātrasyaiva bandhatvāt | punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ | nātajjñaḥ | bhogākāṅkṣāyāḥ muktatvātŚ4: om. ity arthaḥ mukta° (aberratio occuli) | atajjño hi bhogākāṅkṣāṃŚ4: bhog*ā*° tyaktuṃ na śaknoti | atyantatajjñe kṛtakṛtyatvāt asmiñ śāstre anadhikāraḥ | atajjñe tu ayogyatayetiŚ4: °kṛtyatvāt punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ nātajjñaḥ bhogakāṅkṣāyāḥ muktayogyatayeti (aberratio occuli) vibhāgaḥ | atra paramātmatattvaikyam abhidheyam | pade pade tasyaivābhidhānāt svaviṣayajñānadvāreṇa mokṣākhyaparamaprayojanasādhakatvāc ca | sarvaśāstreṣv abhidheyasyaiva paramaprayojanasādhakatvadarśanāt | tadviṣayaṃ samyagjñānam avāntaraprayojanam | anyathā tatkāṅkṣiṇaḥN11: °kāṅkṣiṇaḥ (mumukṣaḥ) amūrkhasyāvāntarādhikāritvaṃ na syāt | paramaprayojaṇam muktir | anyathā tatkāṅkṣiṇaḥ mumukṣoḥ paramādhikāritvaṃN11: °ādhi(kāri)kāvi na syāt | śāstrāvāntaraprayojanayoḥ abhidheyaparamaprayojanayoś ca sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ | adhikārī tu svakaṇṭhenaivokta iti sarvaṃ svastham ||

kulakam | śuṣkā śoṣaṇadharmayuktā | prakṛtatvāt iyaṃ niyatiḥ | ātmanā ghanāsitam atyantakṛṣṇam | ātmānam api bhāyayati bhayāviṣṭaṃ karoti | anyeṣāṃ tu kā katheti bhāvaḥ | ātmānam kathambhūtam | śarīrasya ye khaṭvāṅgabhaṅgāḥ arthāt khaṭvāṅgabhaṅgarūpāḥ avayavāḥ | taiḥ āpūritāmbaram | śarīrakhaṭvāṅgaiḥ kathambhūtaiḥ | paścād ityādi | paścātpralambaḥ ata eva vibhrāntaḥ bhraman | kaumāraḥ kumārasambandhī | rathabarhī yeṣāṃ | taiḥ | bhāṅkārāḥ vātakṛtāḥ jñeyāḥ | lambaś cāsau lolaś ca yaḥ śaraccandras | tena vitīrṇāḥ dattāḥ | kṛtā iti yāvat | haravatŚ4: °van mūrdhajāḥ yeṣāṃ | taiḥ | yathā harasya keśāḥŚ4: °śāś candrakalayāN11: °k(ā)ala° bhāsitāḥ bhavanti | tathāsyāḥ pūrṇena śaraccandreṇeti bhāvaḥ | uccaraccārumandārā vilasaccārumandārā | yā gaurīkavarī | sā eva cāmaraṃ yeṣāṃŚ4: °ṣā | taiḥ | uttāṇḍavaḥŚ4: °vaś cāsau acalākāraḥ | bhairavaḥ mahābhairavaḥŚ4: om. mahā° | sa evādaratumbakaḥN11: (sva)tu*mba*kaḥ ādaraviṣayaḥ vādyabhāṇḍaviśeṣaḥ yeṣāṃ | taiḥ | raṇanti sahasrarandhrāṇi netrarūpāṇiN11: *netrarūpā*; Ś4: °rūpā randhrasahasrāṇi yasya | tādṛśaḥ yaḥ indradehaḥ | sa eva bhikṣākapālakaṃ yeṣāṃ | taiḥ | tathā kṛṣṇaiḥ | idaṃ ca sthūladṛṣṭyartham bāhyadhyānam uktam | sūkṣmadṛṣṭīn prati tu bhaṅgyā kumārādiṣv api niyatisparśaḥ uktaḥ ||
viśvarūpasya virājo | yat śiraścakraṃŚ4: °cakre | tad eva cārupuṣkaramālā | tayā ||
ḍamaravaḥ vādyabhāṇḍaviśeṣāḥ | uḍḍāmarāḥ udbhaṭāḥ | tumbureti gandharvanāma ||

lg.l: ekasmiñ śravaṇe dīrghā himavān asti mudrikā /

note.p: ante kalpānte | candramaṇḍalam eva hāsaḥ | tadyuktasya | candrakāṇi [...]*N11, Ś4: weitere Analyse des Kompositums fehlt.| tābhiḥ cāru yat | vyomaiva piñchaṃŚ4: picchaṃ | tad avacūlaṃ śirobhūṣaṇaṃ yasya | tādṛśasya | mudrikā śvetaḥ karṇābharaṇaviśeṣaḥ ||
gaṇḍamaṇḍale gaṇḍabhittau | kaṭisthā mekhalāŚ4: °sthāname° kaṭimekhalā ||
vidyudvalaya eva varṇikā bhūṣaṇaviśeṣaḥ yasyās | tādṛśī vidyudvalayavarṇikā ||
saṃsārabandhanārtham | ā samantād | dīrghe | asya samanantaroktasyaŚ4: °anantaḥ ārokta°; N11: °anaṃ*taḥ*(ā)rokta° | daivāparaparyāyasya kṛtāntasya ||
jīvena ullasantaḥ | sajīvā iti yāvat | makarāḥ yāsāṃ | tāḥ | kaṅkaṇeṣv api makarikāḥ bhavanti | kiṃ tu nirjīvāḥ ||

vyavahārāṇām mahāvartāḥN11, Ś4: °āvartā punaḥ punar āgamanāni yasyāṃ | sā | tādṛśī sukhaduḥkhaparamparā tasya romālīŚ4: °māvalī rājate | kathambhūtā | rajaḥpūrṇā rajoguṇabharitā | tathā tamaḥśyāmā tamoguṇamalinā | romālīŚ4: °māvalī api āvartayuktā rajaḥpūrṇā tamaḥśyāmā ca bhavati ||
sṛṣṭyā saha niyatyā saha | punaḥ sargārambhe | imāṃ jagadrūpām ||
sargāntaślokenaitat samāpayati

lg.l:
bhūyaḥ karoti bhuvanāni vanāntarāṇi
lokāntarāṇi janajālakakalpanāṃ ca /

ācāracārukalanāṃ ca calācalāṃ ca
paṅkād yathārbhakajano racanām akhinnaḥ //

note.p: calācalām atyantacalām | iti śivam ||
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ vairāgyaprakaraṇe caturviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
*Ś4: śrīrāmāya namaḥ; N11: oṃevaṃ daivavilāsam uktvā phalitam āha
ata iti śeṣaḥ | vṛtte carite | ādiśabdena daivādīnāṃ grahaṇam ||

lg.l: vikrītā iva tiṣṭhāma etair daivādibhir vayam /

note.p: spaṣṭam ||
spaṣṭam ||
spaṣṭam ||
āmayadā rogadāyinī | na rūpeṇa vallabhā arūpavallabhā ||
jagad eva vapuḥ yasya | tādṛśaḥ ||
ārtaṃ dīnam ||
phalguvibhavāḥ nissāravibhavayuktāḥ ||

lg.l: āyur atyantataralam mṛtyur ekas tu niṣṭhuraḥ /

note.p: spaṣṭam ||
kalābhiḥ paravañcanākhyābhiḥ kalābhiḥ | kalaṅkitaḥN11: (aṅkitaḥ) kalaṅ° ||

lg.l: śatravaś cendriyāṇy eva satyaṃ yātam asatyatām /

note.p: ātmā | ātmanā svayam | praharaty ātmānaṃ | durvikalpair iti śeṣaḥ | mana eva aśuddhamanaḥŚ4: °mana eva | na tv anyaḥ | manoripuḥ śuddhasya manaso ripuḥ bhavati ||
paripelavā atīkṣṇāḥ ||

vāñchāviṣayāś ca tāḥ śālinyaś ca āpātaramaṇīyāś ca | tādṛśyaḥ nāryaḥ | sacamatkṛtayaḥ camatkārayuktāḥ | kṛtāḥ kalpitāḥ | bhāvitā iti yāvat | kīdṛśyaḥ nāryaḥ | doṣapatākinyaḥ | rāgādidoṣamayatvāt rāgādidoṣapatākinyaḥ | rasāḥ śāstrādiviṣayāḥ abhilāṣāḥ | nīrasatāṃ śuṣkatāṃ gatāḥ ||

lg.l: vastv avastutayā cāttaṃ dattaṃ cittam ahaṅkṛtau /

note.p: asmābhiḥ | vastu satyaṃ vastu | avastutayā deho 'ham ity evaṃrūpeṇa avastubhāvenāttaṃ gṛhītaṃ | tathā cittam ahaṅkṛtau dattam ahaṅkāragrastaṃ kṛtam ity arthaḥ | bhāvāḥŚ4: °vā abhāvarodhitāḥ nāśagṛhītāḥ | na jñātā iti śeṣaḥ | ataḥ bhavāntaḥ nādhigamyate na prāpyate ||

lg.l: rāgoragoN11, Ś4: garora° vilasati virāgaṃ nopagacchati //

note.p: virāgaṃ rāgābhāvaḥAnakoluth des Autors? | nopagacchati nāgacchati ||
tattvam paramārthaḥ ||

lg.l: dhṛtir vaidhuryam āyāti ratir nityam avastuni //

note.p: avastuni avastubhūte dehādau ||
māndyena jāḍyena ||

lg.l: gatir na vidyate kācit kvacin nodeti satyatā //

note.p: yuvatā lakṣaṇayā stryāsaktiḥ ||
spaṣṭam ||
dhīratāN11, Ś4: °rata adhīratām eti naśyatīty arthaḥ ||
nīyate | kāleneti śeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: diśoŚ4: dṛśyo 'pi hi na dṛśyante deśo 'py avyapadeśabhāk /
śailā api hi śīryanteN11, Ś4: śīrṣa° kaivāsthā mādṛśeN11: °dṛśo jane //

note.p: deśaḥ avyapadeśabhāk deśeti vyapadeśaṃ na bhajatītiŚ4: bhava° tādṛk syāt | deśasyāpi deśeti nāma kālena na syād ity arthaḥ | yatredṛśānām īdṛśā daśā bhaviṣyanti tatra mādṛśe jane kā eva āsthā ko viśvāsaḥ syād iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: dravanty api samudrāś ca śīryante tārakā api /
siddhā api na sidhyanti kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||

lg.l: dharāpi yāti vaidhuryaṃ kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane //

note.p: asattayā nāśena | dyaur api adyate grasyate ||

lg.l: amarā api māryante kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane //

note.p: māryante | kāleneti śeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: śakro 'py ākramyate śakrair yamo 'pi hi niyamyate /
vāyor apy asty avāyuṣṭvaṃ kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane //

note.p: śakraiḥ navīnaiḥ śakraiḥ ||

lg.l: somo 'pi vyomatām eti mārtāṇḍo 'py eti khaṇḍanam /
rugṇatām agnirŚ4: agnim apy eti kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane //

note.p: vyomatām | nāśam ity arthaḥ ||

lg.l: parameṣṭhy apyŚ4: °ṣṭhyāpi aniṣṭhāvān harate harim apy ajaḥ /
bhavo 'py abhavatāṃ yāti kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane //

note.p: bhavo 'py śrīmahādevo 'pi | abhavatām amahādevabhāvam ||

lg.l: kālaḥ śakalatām eti niyatiś cāpi nīyate /
kham apy ālīyate 'nante kaivāsthā mādṛśe jane //

note.p: anante antarahite kasmiṃścid vastuni ||

lg.l: bhuvanāni viḍambyante kenāpiN11, Ś4: kenacid bhramadāyinā //

note.p: aśravyaṃ tathā avācyaṃ tathā durdarśaṃ tantraṃ vañcanopāyaḥ | yasya | tādṛśena | kenāpīti anirvācyenety arthaḥ ||

lg.l: na so 'sti triṣu lokeṣu yas teneha na badhyate //

note.p: dehādau ātmabhāvaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ | tena kenāpīty arthaḥ ||
śilāyuktāḥN11, Ś4: °ktā śailāḥ śilāśailāḥ | teṣāṃ kaṭaprāḥ samūhāḥ | teṣu paridolyate dolanaṃ kāryate ||
dharāgolakam bhūgolaṃ | veṣṭyate veṣṭanayuktaṃ kriyate | dhiṣṇyacakreṇeti karaṇe tṛtīyā ||
asurabhoginaḥ daityasarpāḥ | kalpamātreṇa kalpamātraparimāṇena ||
īśānena yaḥ raṇaḥ | tena labdhaḥ parākramaḥ | yena | tādṛśaḥ ||
madaiḥ madavāribhiḥ | vakratāṃ kāmakalāvidagdhatvam | kāmaprasaṅgeneha vasantābhidhānam ||

lg.l: spaṣṭīkartum manaḥ śakto na viveko mahān api //

note.p: mahān api vivekaḥ manaḥ spaṣṭīkartuṃ śuddhīkartuṃ | śakto na bhavati | manaḥ kathambhūtaṃ | anurakto yaḥ aṅganālokaḥN11: a(thā)ganā° | tasya yat locanālokitamN11, Ś4: °tām dṛṣṭipātas | tadvad ākṛtiḥŚ4: °tir yasya | tādṛśam | atyantacalam ity arthaḥ ||

lg.l: buddha eva sukhī manye svārthaśītalayāN11, Ś4: śīlata° dhiyā //

note.p: buddhaḥ jñānī | svārthe svaprayojane | śītalayā | na svārthanimittam paritaptayeti yāvat ||
jīvitāmbudheḥ kallolāḥ jīvāN11: °l*ā*ḥ jīv*ā*ḥ ity arthaḥ ||
doṣagulmakasāraṅgāḥ doṣapriyā ity arthaḥ | mṛgo gulmapriyo bhavati | nigīrṇāḥ grastāḥ | moheneti śeṣaḥ | sāraṅgā apiN11, Ś4: ati° pāśapātinaḥ jaṅgale kirātena grastā bhavanti ||

lg.l:
saṅkṣīyate jagati janmaparamparāsu
lokasya tair iha kukarmabhirN11: ku*ka*rma° āyur etat /

ākāśapādapalatākṛtapāśakalpaṃ
yeṣām phalaṃ na hi vicāravido 'pi vidmaḥ //

note.p: ākāśapādapalatākṛtapāśakalpam asad ity arthaḥ | iha karma kurvantīti bhāvaḥ ||
sargāntaślokenaitat samāpayati

lg.l:
adyotsavo 'yam ṛtur eṣa tatheha yātrā
te bāndhavāḥ sukham idaṃ sa viśeṣabhogaḥ /

itthaṃ mudhaiva kalayan svavikalpajālam
ālolapelavamatir galatīha lokaḥ //

note.p: ālolapelavamatir aticañcalasvalpabuddhirN11, Ś4: °pelavam aticañca° ity arthaḥ | svavikalpajālam ity anena utsavādīnām atyantāsattvam uktam | iti śivam ||
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ vairāgyaprakaraṇe pañcaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
*Ś4: śrīrāmāya namaḥ; N11: oṃpunar api saṃsāradurvilasitam eva kathayati

lg.l:
anyacN11: anyaś ca tātātitarām aramye
manorame veha jagatsvarūpe /

na kiñcid apy eti tad arthajātaṃ
yenātiviśrāntim upaiti cetaḥ //

note.p: aham bravīmīti śeṣaḥ | he tātāham anyac ca bravīmi | kim bravīṣīty apekṣāyām āhātitarām iti | manorame vā manorame iva | arthajātam padārthasamūhaḥ | atyantaviśrāntau hi satyām anyārthaviṣayākāṅkṣā na punar udbhaved iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l:
bālye gate kalpitakelilole
vayomṛge dāradarīṣu kīrṇe /

śarīrake jarjaratām prayāte
vidūyate kevalam eva lokaḥ //

note.p: vayomṛge yauvanākhye mṛge | jarjaratāṃ vṛddhatvaṃ | vidūyate santapyate ||

lg.l:
kṣaṇād gate jīvitacañcarīke
janasya saṃsārasaro viśuṣkam //

note.p: vihāya tyaktvā | jīvitacañcarīke jīvitākhye bhramare ||

lg.l:
yadā yadā pākam upaiti nūnaṃ
tadā tadeyaṃ navam ātanoti /

note.p: nūnaṃ niścaye | navam iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | tena na paunaruktyam | āścaryaṃ ca pākaṃ gatāyāḥ latāyāḥ navaprasūnasya navam ātananam ||
spaṣṭam ||

lg.l:
śarīranauś carmanibaddhabandhā
bhavāmbudhāvŚ4: °dhau vā° ālulitā bhramantī /

pravroḍyate pañcabhir indriyākhyair
adho vahantī makarair adhīnā //

note.p: pañcabhir indriyākhyaiḥ makaraiḥ śarīranauḥŚ4: °nau pravroḍyate magnā sampādyate iti sambandhaḥ | ālulitaṃ samantāc cañcalam ||

lg.l:
paribhramantaḥ kṣapayanti kāmam
manomṛgā no phalam āpnuvanti //

note.p: kāmaṃ niścaye | tṛṣṇālatānāṃ yat kānanam | tatra carantīti tādṛśās | tathā paribhramantaḥ paribhramaṇaśīlāḥŚ4: °bhramana° | amī manomṛgāḥ | kāmamahīruheṣuN11, Ś4: kāmā° kānanagateṣu paramakāmākhyavṛkṣeṣu | gatam śākhāśataṃN11, Ś4: °gataṃ | arthāt avāntarakāmarūpaṃ śākhāśataṃ | kṣapayanti cālayanti | svaviṣayaṃ kurvantīti yāvat | tathāpi phalaṃ no āpnuvanti ||
kṛcchreṣu āpatsu | svāmyeṣu sampatsu | anutsiktaṃ darparahitaṃ sat | manaḥ | tenābhirāmāḥN11, Ś4: °rāmaḥ ||

lg.l:
taranti mātaṅgaghaṭātaraṅgaṃ
raṇāmbudhiṃ ye mayi te na śūrāḥ /

śūrās ta eveha manastaraṅgaṃ
ye svendriyāmbhodhim imaṃŚ4: ime taranti //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||

lg.l:
akliṣṭaparyantaphalābhirāmā
na dṛśyate kasyacid eva kācit /

kriyā durāśāhatacittavṛtter
yām etya viśrāntim upaiti lokaḥ //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||

lg.l:
kīrtyā jagad dikkuharam pratāpaiḥ
śriyā gṛhaṃ sattvabalena lakṣmīm /

ye pūrayanty akṣatadhairyabandhā
na te jagatyāṃ sulabhā mahāntaḥ //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||

lg.l:
sarvaṃ samāyānti samiddhavegāḥ
sarvāḥ śriyaḥ santatam āpadaś ca //

note.p: śilānām iyaṃ śailā | sā cāsau bhittiḥ śailabhittiḥN11: *śailabhittiḥ* | gireḥ śailabhittiḥ giriśailabhittis | tasyāḥ ||

lg.l:
putrāś ca dārāś ca dhanaṃ ca buddhyā
prakalpyate tāta rasāyanaṃ ca /

sarvaṃ tu tan nāma karoty athānte
yatrātiramyā viṣamūrchanaiva //

note.p: prakalpyate kalpanayā bhāvyate | rasāyanam | amṛtam iva | caśabda ivārthaḥ | ante pariṇāme ||

lg.l:
bhāvān smaran svānŚ4: sarasvān abhidharmariktāñ
jano jarāvān abhidahyate 'ntaḥ //

note.p: kāyavayo'vasāne vṛddhatve | bhāvān abhilāṣān | abhitaḥ dharmeṇa riktānN11, Ś4: °ktāṃ abhidharmariktān | antaḥ manasi ||

lg.l:
cetaś caladbarhiṇapiñchalolaṃŚ4: °piccha°
viśrāntim āgacchatu kena puṃsāmŚ4: pusām //

note.p: kāmārthadharmāṇāṃ yā āptiḥ | tayā kṛśāntarābhiḥ niḥsārābhiḥ | mokṣārthaṃ na kaścit kriyāṃ karotīti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l:
kriyāphalaiḥ daivavaśād upetair
viḍambyate bhinnarucir hi lokaḥ //

note.p: hi niścaye | viḍambyate vañcyate | kriyāphalānāṃ ca anavāptarūpatvaṃ kṣaṇanaśvaratvena jñeyam ||

lg.l:
imāny amūnīti vibhāvitāniN11: vibhāvibhāvitāni
kāryāṇy aparyantamanoramāṇi /

note.p: jāyājanarañjaneneti hetau tṛtīyā | jaṭānāṃ yā jarā | tadantam ||

lg.l:
parṇāni śīrṇāni yathā tarūṇāṃ
sametya janmāśu layam prayānti /

tathaiva lokāḥ svavivekahīnāḥ
sametya gacchanti kuto 'py ahobhiḥ //

note.p: svavivekahīnāḥ ātmavicārarahitāḥ ||

lg.l:
itas tato dūrataraṃ vihṛtya
praviśya gehaṃ divasāvasāne /

vivekilokāśrayisādhukarma-
rikte 'hni yāte ka upaiti nidrām //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||

lg.l:
vidrāvite śatrujane samaste
samāgatāyām abhitaś ca lakṣmyām /

sevyanta etāni sukhāni yāvat
tāvat samāyāti kuto 'pi mṛtyuḥŚ4: mṛttuḥ //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||

lg.l:
vilobhyamānā janatā jagatyāṃ
na vetty upāyātam aho na yātam //

note.p: kuto 'pi anirvācyāt kasmāccid vastunaḥ | bhāvaiḥ padārthaiḥ | upāyātam bhāvaviṣayajanma | yātam bhāvaviṣayasaraṇam ||

lg.l:
yiyāsubhiḥ kālamukhaṃ kriyante
janaiḍakaisN11: janai(ru)*ḍa*° te hatakarmabandhāḥ /

ye pīnatāmŚ4: pīnana° eva balād upetya
śarīrabandhe nanu te bhavanti //

note.p: janaiḍakaiḥN11: janai(ru)*ḍa*° janākhyaiḥ meṣaiḥ | te hatakarmabandhāḥ kutsitakarmaprapañcāḥ | kriyante | te ke | ye pratisvaṃŚ4: °sva sthitāḥ yebalādN11, Ś4: om. haṭhena | pīnatām eva na tu kṣīnatām | etya āgatya | te tava | śarīrabandhe śarīrabandhārthaṃ | nanu bhavanti niścayena bhavantīty arthaḥ | karmavaśād eva hi puruṣaḥ dehabandham prāpnoti ||

lg.l:
ajasram āgacchati satvareyam
anārataṃ gacchati satvaraiva /

kuto 'pi lolā janatā jagatyāṃ
taraṅgamālā kṣaṇabhaṅgureva //

haranti svavaśīkurvanti mohayanti ca | raktacchadāḥ raktapattrāḥ raktādharāś ca | lolalatāḥ lolaśākhāḥ | lakṣaṇayā lolabhujāś ca ||

saṅketaḥ gantavyo deśaḥ | yathā yātrāyām mārge janā anyo'nyaṃ rātrau militvā prabhāte samānaṃ gantavyaṃ deśaṃ gacchanti | tathā saṃsāre 'pi putrādibhiḥ militvā mṛtvā paralokākhyaṃ deśaṃ gacchanti | atas teṣu bhāvabandhanaṃ na yuktam iti bhāvaḥ ||

note.p: yatra daivavaśāt punaḥ punaḥ upetya upāgatya | svadehabhāreṇa śākhopaśākhabhāreṇa | kṛtaḥ apakāroŚ4: kṛtāpa° yasya | saḥN11: *sa*; Ś4: sa taruḥ kuṭhāraiḥ janena lūyate | hi niścaye | tatra tasmin saṃsāre | āśvāsane kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ kā yuktatā bhavati | upetyety asya kṛtety anenaN11: kṛte*ty a*°; Ś4: kṛtye° sahaikakartṛtvamŚ4: kartṛka° bṛhadbhayāyaN11: °bhay*ā*(nāśā)ya eva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||

viṣadrumasyeva janasya saṅgād

note.p: atiśayena doṣe vṛttir yasya | saḥŚ4: sas | tasya ||

kās tā dṛśoŚ4: dṛśyo yāsu na santi doṣāḥ
kās tā diśo yāsu na duḥkhadāhaḥ /

māṃsair janāḥ pauruṣabaddhabhāvā

pṛthagvibhāgena padārthalakṣmyā
etajN11: (jā)*e*taj jagan netarad asti kiñcit //

note.p: cetanayā anuviddhaḥN11: a*nu*vi° vyāptaḥ | nabhaḥsthaḥŚ4: nabha° payonibaddhaḥ jalāvaṣṭabdhaḥN11: (vā)*ja*lā° | aṇucayaḥ paramāṇusamūhaḥ | padārthalakṣmyāḥ pṛthagvibhāgena padārthalakṣmīsambandhinā pṛthak vibhāgena | ālokyate | uktaviśeṣaṇāḥ paramāṇava eva nānārthabhāvena dṛśyante iti yāvat | etaj jagad asti | itarat anyat | kiñcij jagan nāsti | padārthanānābhāvasyaiva jagattvāt | ataś cātra kiṃ ramyatvaṃ kiṃ vāramyatvam iti bhāvaḥ ||

vātāttā vātagṛhītā ||
prathamānaḥ upyamānaḥ ||

manaḥpavanena paryastāḥ īritāḥ | ye bhūribhūtās | te eva rajaḥpaṭaḥ rajovṛtaḥ paṭaḥ | yasyāḥ | sā | parāvartaḥŚ4: °rtāḥ punarāvṛttirūpo bhramaḥ | jāgatī sthitiḥ jagadrūpā sthitiḥ | nṛtte ya āveśaḥ | tatra vivṛttā pravṛttā | saṃsāre saṃsārākhye raṅge | yā ārabhaṭī | tasyāḥ naṭī | ārabhaṭī raudrarasavṛttiviśeṣaḥ ||

saṃsārasya rañjanā rāgaḥ | nṛttamatteva rājate | kathambhūtā | gandharvanagarākāraḥ yaḥ viparyāsaḥ | taṃ vidadhātīti tādṛśī | tathāpāṅgavat bhaṅguraḥ | apāṅgeṣu ca bhaṅguraḥ | yaḥ udāravyavahāraḥ | tena manoramā | tathā taḍittaralam aticañcalam | ālokaṃ svaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ svaśarīraprakāśanaṃ ca | punaḥ punaḥ ātanvānā ||

note.p: subhagāḥ ākāramātreṇa manoharāḥ ||

sphuṭataram munayo hatabuddhayaḥ //

note.p: abhimataṃ samanantaroktasya praśnasyottaram | iti śivam ||
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ vairāgyaprakaraṇe dvātriṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
iti śivam ||

lg.l: ātmīyaś cānyadīyaś ca jaya]ty atibalas tayoḥ //

note.p: samāsamau arthānarthotpādakatvāt samaviṣamau | ātmīyaḥ ucchāstraḥ | anyadīyaḥ śāstroktaḥ iti | dvau puruṣārthau huḍāv iva yudhyete yuddhaṃ kurutaḥ | tatrāpi samaḥ śāstroktaḥ | asamaḥ ucchāstra iti vibhāgaḥ | tatra tayoḥ dvayoḥ puruṣārthayoḥ madhye | atibalo°l⟨aṃ⟩[o] jayati | huḍaḥ śṛṅgasahito mṛgaviśeṣaḥ ||
tad evāha°āhānarthaḥ ...

lg.l: anarthaḥ prāpyate yatra śāstritād api pauruṣāt /
anarthakaṃ tu balavat tatra jñeyaṃ svapauruṣam //

note.p: yatra puruṣeṇa śāstritād api pauruṣāt anarthaḥ prāpyate tatra anarthakam anarthotpādakaṃ°pāda[kaṃ] svapauruṣam aśāstrīyaṃ pauruṣaṃ | balavaj jñeyam | tanmadhye praviṣṭād balavataḥ svapauruṣād evāsau anartha utpanna iti jñeyam iti bhāvaḥ | arthāt tu yatra anarthaḥ na prāpyate tatra śāstrīyam eva balavaj jñeyam | dvayoḥ pauruṣayoś ca sarvatra sandhir asti asahāyasyaikakasyotthānāsaṃbhavāt ||
puruṣasya kartavyaṃ darśayati

lg.l: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya dantair dantān vicūrṇayan /

note.p: paraṃ pauruṣam śāstroktaṃ pauruṣam | udyuktaḥ udyogayuktaḥ | prāktanaṃ pauruṣam vāsanākhyam prāktanam | api śubhaṃ śubhakāry eva | yataḥ śubhā vāsanaiva mokṣadāyinī proktety aśubham ity uktam ||

lg.l: balād adhaspadīkāryā pratyakṣād adhikā na sā //

note.p: pratyakṣeṇa tu pauruṣasyaiva niyojane sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam ity etad abhipretya pratyakṣād adhikā na sety uktam ||

lg.l: prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ yāvad aśubhaṃ śāmyati svayam //

note.p: svapauruṣaṃ yatitavyam śāstrānusāreṇa svaviṣayaṃ prati yatnayuktaṃ kāryaṃ | yatitavyam iti ṇicyuktaḥ prayogaḥ ||
spaṣṭam ||

lg.l: asaddaivam adhaḥ kṛtvā nityam udyuktayā dhiyā /

note.p: bhūtyai muktirūpāyaiśvaryāya ||
spaṣṭam ||
saṃsārakuharāt saṃsāraśvabhrāt | hariṇā siṃhena | aripañjarāt aribhūtāt pañjarāt ||
pratyavekṣeta kīdṛśam iti vimarśaviṣayaṃ kuryāt ||

lg.l: vraṇe kīṭa ivāsvādya vayaḥ kāryaṃ na bhasmasāt //

note.p: kalilaṃ pāpajanakam | komalaṃ āmukhe komalatayā pratibhāsamānam | vraṇe randhre ||

lg.l: aśubhenāśubhaṃ nityaṃ daivaṃ nāma na kiṃcana //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||

lg.l: svabhujābhyām imau sarpāv iti prekṣya palāyatām //

note.p: svabhujābhyām iti pañcamī ||

lg.l: daivaṃ saṃprerayati mām iti mugdhadhiyāṃ mukham /

note.p: adṛṣṭā | śreṣṭhā uttamā | dṛṣṭiḥ pauruṣākhyā dṛṣṭiḥ | yaiḥ teṣām ||
ātmajñānam eva mahān arthaḥ yeṣāṃ tāni ||
nijehitaiḥ svapauruṣaiḥ | durīpsitam duṣṭakāṅkṣitam ||

lg.l: pauruṣaṃ ca na cānantaṃ na yatnam abhivāñchate /

note.p: pauruṣam anantaṃ antarahitaṃ | na ca bhavati | kiṃ tu niyatam eva bhavati | pauruṣaṃ kartṛ | yatnam na abhivāñchate na svotpādakatvena kāṅkṣate | yatnena svasya°sva⟨---⟩[sya] niyamaṃ na laṅghayati iti yāvat | puruṣo mahatāpi yatnena svasmin niyataṃ pauruṣaṃ na laṅghayituṃ śaknotīti bhāvaḥ | etad dṛṣṭāntena sugamaṃ karoti | na yatneneti ||
pūrvoktam evārthaṃ sphuṭayati

lg.l: yathā ghaṭaḥ parimito yathā parimitaḥ paṭaḥ /

note.p: ataḥ svapauruṣāviṣaye ākāśagamanādau na yatitavyam iti bhāvaḥ ||
anyathā śāstrārthasatsaṅgasamācārāṇām abhāve ||
pauruṣasya svarūpam daivam vyavaharan daivam iti nāmnā vyavaharan | na tu paramārthato daivam iti jānann iti yāvat ||
spaṣṭam ||

lg.l: guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo 'rthaḥ saṃprāpyate hi taiḥ //

note.p: svo 'rthaḥ mokṣākhyaḥ kāṅkṣito 'rthaḥ | puruṣeṇeti śeṣaḥ | hiśabdaḥ niścaye | taiḥ prasiddhaiḥ guṇair iti karaṇe tṛtīyā | yatneneti tu hetau ||
upasaṃhāraṃ karoti

lg.l: iti pwratyakṣato dṛṣṭam anubhūtaṃ kṛtaṃ śrutam /
daivottham iti manyante ye hatās te kubuddhayaḥ //

note.p: kṛtam śrutamśr[utam] anuṣṭhitam | sarvam daivāt uttham asti | iti ye manyante | te kubuddhayaḥ hatāḥ naṣṭāḥ ||

lg.l:
ālasyaṃ yadi na bhavej jagaty anarthaḥ
ko na syād bahudhaniko bahuśruto vā /

ālasyād iyam avaniḥ sasāgarāntā
saṃpūrṇā narapaśubhiś ca nirdhanaiś ca //

note.p: narapaśubhiḥ ajñānibhiḥ | nirdhanaiḥ daridraiḥ | tasmād dhanakāṅkṣibhiḥ mokṣakāṅkṣibhir vā pauruṣam eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ ||
pauruṣānuṣṭhānaprakāraṃ kathayati

avirataṃ kalpitā yā keliḥ | tayā lolelol⟨y⟩e bālye | bālabhāve gate sati | puruṣaḥ paugaṇḍasyāvasthāviśeṣasya maṇḍanabhūtaṃ yat vayaḥ | tataḥ prabhṛti yauvanāt prabhṛti iti yāvat | prayatnāt yatnena | svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇāni kuryāt | kaiḥ kṛtvā | satsaṅgamaiḥ sādhusaṅgamaiḥ | satsaṅgamābhāve hi svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇam aśakyakriyam eva | puruṣaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ | padapadārthavibuddhabuddhiḥ | padapadārthayoḥ vibuddhā buddhiḥ yasya | tādṛśaḥ | padapadārthajña ity arthaḥ ||
śrīvālmīkiḥ sargāntaślokena bharadvājaṃ prati tatratyaṃ dināvasānaṃ kathayati

lg.l:
ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma
sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /

snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma
śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //

note.p: munau vasiṣṭhe | iti evam | uktavati sati | divasaḥ jagāma avasānaṃ gataḥ | yataḥ inaḥ sūryaḥ | astaṃ jagāma | sabhā dāśarathī sabhā | kṛtanamaskaraṇā kṛtamuninamaskārā satī | sāyantanāya vidhaye sāyaṃ sandhyārthaṃ | snātuṃ jagāma | sā sabhā śyāmākṣaye rātrikṣaye | ravikaraiḥ sūryakaraiḥ | saha ājagāma ca | iti śivam ||
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe pañcamaḥ sargaḥ ||
prabhāte*prabhāte* śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ śrīrāmaṃ prati pūrvasargoktavastuphalitaṃ kathayati

lg.l: tasmāt prākpauruṣaṃ daivaṃ nānyatnānya(sta)t tat projjhya dūrataḥ /

note.p: tasmāt pūrvasargoktāt hetoḥ | prākpauruṣaṃ prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ | daivam bhavati | anyat pauruṣād bhinnaṃ kiṃcid daivam | na bhavati | ataḥ puruṣaḥ tat daivaṃ | dūrataḥ projjhya arthāt adyatanaṃ śubhaṃ pauruṣam āśritya | sādhusaṅgamasacchāstraiḥ hetubhūtaiḥ | jīvam balāt haṭhena | uttārayet | saṃsārād iti śeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: yathā yathā prayatnaḥ syād bhaved āśu phalaṃ tathā /
iti pauruṣam evāsti daivam astu tad eva vaḥ //

note.p: prayatnaḥ pauruṣam | tat yuṣmābhiḥ aṅgīkṛtaṃ daivam | vaḥ eva yuṣmākam evāstu ||

lg.l: duḥkhād yathā duḥkhakāle hā kaṣṭam iti kathyate /
hākaṣṭaśabdaparyāyas tathā hā daivam ity api //

note.p: tathā hā kaṣṭam itivat hā daivam iti dīnānām evoktir astīti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: bālaḥ prabalapuṃseva taj jetum iva śakyate //

note.p: prāksvakarmaṇaḥ prāktanasvakarmaṇaḥ | itarākāram daivaṃ nāma na vidyate | prāktanāt svakarmaṇaḥ pṛthaksattāṃ na bhajate ity arthaḥ | ataḥ puṃsā tat daivaṃ | jetuṃ śakyate keneva | prabalapuṃsā iva | yathā tena bālo jetuṃ śakyate tathety arthaḥ ||

lg.l: yathāśu śubhatāṃ yāti prāktanaṃ kukṛtaṃ tathā //

note.p: adyācāreṇa adya kṛtenācāreṇa | tathā tadvat | prāktanaṃ kukṛtam adyatanena sukṛtena śubhatāṃ yāti ||

lg.l: te mūḍhāḥ prākṛtā dīnāḥ sthitā daivaparāyaṇāḥ //

note.p: tajjayāya kuvāsanārūpaprāktanāśubhapauruṣajayāya | lābhalave sāṃsārikapadārthāptirūpe lābhaleśe | laṃpaṭāh lobhayuktāḥ | prākṛtāḥ nīcāḥ ||

lg.l: pauruṣeṇa kṛtaṃ karma daivād yad abhinaśyati /

note.p: nāśayituḥ nāśakasya kālādeḥ ||

ekasmin vṛnte sthitau phalau ekavṛntaphalau | tayoḥ api madhyāt ekaphalaṃ śūnyakoṭaram sārarahitamadhyaṃ yat bhavati | arthāt dvitīyaṃ sārabharitamadhyaṃ jñeyam | tatra tasmin sthāne | tadrasasaṃvidaḥ tayoḥ phalayoḥ yā rasarūpā saṃvit | tasyāḥ tadrasasyeti yāvat | tathā tena prakāreṇa | yatnaḥ pauruṣaṃ sphuritaḥ | raseneva tādṛśaṃ pauruṣaṃ kṛtaṃ yenaikaṃ phalaṃ sārarahitaṃ saṃpannaṃ | na tv anyaśaṅkitasya°sy(ā)a° daivasyātra kāpi śaktir astīti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: yat prayānti jagadbhāvāḥ saṃsiddhā api saṃkṣayam /

note.p: kṣayakārakasya nāśakartuḥ kālasya | yaḥ yatnaḥ pauruṣam | tasya ||

lg.l: bhikṣuko maṅgalebhena nṛpo yat kriyate balāt /

note.p: maṅgalebhena maṅgalahastinā | bhikṣukaḥ nṛpaḥ rājā | balāt yat kriyate amātyebhapaurāṇāṃ rājyapradātṝṇāṃ mantrimaṅgalahastināgarāṇāṃ°n⟨a⟩[ā]garā° | prayatnasya tadrājyadānarūpasya pauruṣasya sahaphalaṃ bhavati | na daivasya ||

lg.l: alpaṃ pauruṣam ākramya tathā śūreṇa cūrṇyate //

note.p: yathā dantaiḥ pauruṣeṇa annam ākramya svavaśīkṛtya | cūrṇyate | tathā śūreṇādyatanapauruṣayuktena puruṣeṇa | alpaṃ prāktanatvena jīrṇaprāyaṃ | pauruṣaṃ ākramya cūrṇyate ||

lg.l: yatheṣṭaṃ viniyujyante te taiḥ karmasu loṣṭavat //

note.p: hi yasmāt | asmābhiḥ yatnaśālināṃ pauruṣaśālināṃ | mahatāṃ lāghavaṃ cāturyam | anubhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭam | kathaṃ anubhūtam ity | atrāha | yatheṣṭam iti | yataḥ taiḥ yatnaśālibhiḥ | te arthāt pauruṣarahitāḥ puruṣāḥ | yatheṣṭaṃ svecchānusāreṇa | loṣṭavat karmasu viniyujyante ||

lg.l: śaktasya pauruṣaṃ dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ vāpi yad bhavet /
tad daivam ity aśaktena buddham ātmany abuddhinā //

note.p: śaktasya mahatā pauruṣeṇa yuktasya | dṛśyasya puruṣāder adṛśyasya kālādeś ca | dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ vā yat pauruṣaṃ bhavet | abuddhinā samyagjñānarahitena | aśaktena tadapekṣayā śaktirahitena puruṣeṇa | tat śaktasya pauruṣam | ātmani svasmin viṣaye | daivaṃ buddham jñātamjñā⟨n⟩[t]am | anyathā daivena me kṛtam itii[ti] na brūyāt ||

lg.l: tasthuṣām apy adhiṣṭhātṛvatām etat sphuṭaṃ mithaḥ //

note.p: balavadbhūtayatnaḥ | bhūtānām kṣudrabhūtānāṃ upari | daivam iti sthitam bhavati | puruṣo hi yatra na paryāpto bhavati tatraiva daivena me kṛtam iti kathayati | na kevalam etan mayaiva jñātaṃ kiṃtv anyair apīty āha | tasthuṣām iti | apiśabdaḥ samuccaye°u⟨ś⟩[c]ca° | mithaḥ anyo'nyam | adhiṣṭhātṛvatāṃ tasthuṣām prerakayuktānāṃ sthitānām puruṣāṇām api | etat mayā uktaḥ arthaḥ | sphuṭaṃ prakaṭo bhavati | te hi parasparaṃ kṣudrataratamādibhedenādhiṣṭheyāḥ bhavanti | utkṛṣṭataratamādibhedena tv adhiṣṭhātāraḥ | adhiṣṭhātā eva cādhiṣṭheyaṃ prati daivam | ataḥ eteṣu madukto 'rthaḥ sphuṭa eva bhavati iti bhāvaḥ ||
nanu bhikṣukarājyaviṣaye 'yaṃ nyāyo nāstīty | atrāha

lg.l: sā yā bhikṣukarājyasya kartrī dhartrī prajāsthiteḥ //

note.p: śāstāś⟨a⟩[ā]stā purohitaḥ | sa ca amātyaś ca | ibhaś ca maṅgalahastī ca | paurāś ca | teṣām | sā svabhāvadhīḥ svabhāvāt utthitā bhikṣurājyadānarūpā buddhiḥ | avikalpyā nāśayitum aśakyāśaktā iti yāvat bhavati | sā kā | yā bhikṣukarājyasya kartrī bhavati | taddvāreṇa prajāsthiteḥ dhartrī ca bhavati | ato 'trāpy ayam eva nyāya iti bhāvaḥ | iyaṃ hi rītiḥ | yatra deśe rājā mriyate | tasya putraś ca na syāt | tatra maṅgalahastī yaṃ namati | tam eva rājānaṃ kurvantīti ||
puruṣaspandaḥ pauruṣam | tatra dvayoḥ pauruṣayoḥ madhye | anudvegavān udvegarahitaḥ | lakṣaṇayā atibala ity arthaḥ ||
nanu tatra kaḥ prāyaḥ balavān astīty | atrāha

lg.l: daivaṃ jetum ato yatnair bālo yūneva śakyate //

note.p: pratyakṣāt pratyakṣapramāṇena | dṛśyate hi adyatanaḥ śubhācāraḥ hyastanam aśubhaṃ nāśayan | phalitam āha | daivam iti | ataḥ yatnaiḥ adyatanaiḥ pauruṣaiḥ | daivaṃ prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ | jetum śakyate | keneva | yūneva | yathā yūnā bālaḥ jetuṃ śakyate tathety arthaḥ ||

lg.l: meghena nīyate yad vā vatsaropārjitā kṛṣiḥ /

note.p: atrāpi na daivasya kācic chaktir astīti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: krameṇopārjite 'py arthe naṣṭe kāryā na kheditā /
na balaṃ yatra me śaktaṃ tatra kā paridevanā //

note.p: balam pauruṣam | na hi janaḥ aśakyaḥ rājyādivastuprāptyarthaṃ pratyahaṃ paridevanāyuktopari⟨v⟩[d]e⟨d⟩[v]anā° bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: yan na śaknomi tasyārthe yadi duḥkhaṃ karomy aham /

note.p: amānitamṛtyoḥ tāvad⟨tadvat⟩ [tāvad] mṛtyupātam°tyu⟨ḥ⟩[-]pā° api anaṅgīkurvataḥ ||
bhāvāḥ mṛtyvādirūpāḥ padārthāḥ ||
phalitaṃ kathayati
amalatām rāgādimalarāhityam ||

lg.l: aihikaḥ puruṣārthaś ca jagaty abhyadhikas tayoḥ //

note.p: phalotpādakau drumau phaladrumau ||

lg.l: karma yaḥ prāktanaṃ tucchaṃ na nihanti śubhehitaiḥ /

note.p: karma pauruṣam | anīśaḥ asamarthaḥ | vāṅmanaḥsukhaduḥkhau apy asau nāśayituṃ na śaknoti | śarīraduḥkhanāśe tu kā katheti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: sa niryāti jaganmohān mṛgendraḥ pañjarād iva //

note.p: sadācāreṇa sādhvācāreṇa | vihāraḥ vidyate yasya | tādṛśaḥ | sa iti | sa eva śubhapauruṣabhājanam iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: kaścin māṃ prerayaty evam ity anarthakukalpane /
yaḥ sthito dṛṣṭam utsṛjya tyājyo 'sau dūrato 'dhamaḥ //

note.p: dṛṣṭam pratyakṣadṛṣṭaphalaṃ pauruṣam ||
yathāśāstram svaśāstrānatikrameṇa | vihartavyaṃ vihāraḥ kāryaḥ ||
svām svajātyanusāriṇīm | upatiṣṭhanti samīpam āgacchanti | sarvāṇi sakalāni śreyāṃsi ||
svārthaprāpake svaprayojanasādhake kārye | ekam atyantaṃ | prayatnaparatā śāstrayantritā śāstrabuddhā ||

spandadharmiṇyāḥ spandasvarūpāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ | svārthasādhakatā svayam anyanirapekṣaṃ bhavati | sādhusaṅgamaśāstrārthatīkṣṇayā dhiyā sambandhinī svārthasādhakatā abhyūhyate vivecyate | kā svārthasādhakatā | śubhā | kā śubheti vyavasthāpyate ity arthaḥ ||

lg.l: sa yebhyaḥ prāpyate 'nantaṃ te sevyāḥ śāstrasādhavaḥ //

note.p: sarvatra samadarśitvaṃ samatā | tadrūpaḥ ānandaḥ samatānandaḥ | paramārtham paramopādeyaṃ | saḥ samatānandaḥ | pauruṣam āśrityopāsyaḥ ||

lg.l: prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ tac ced daivaśabdena kathyate /
tad yuktam etad etasmin nāsti nāpavadāmahe //

note.p: tat prasiddhaṃ | prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ daivaśabdena cet yadi | kathyate | yuṣmābhir iti śeṣaḥ | tat kathanaṃ | yuktaṃ bhavati | yata etat samatānandaprāptyupāyatvamsamatā⟨samatā⟩nanda° | etasmin nāsti | ataḥ vayaṃ nāpavadāmahe tadapavādaṃ na kurmaḥ | upekṣāviṣayatvād iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivam anyad yais te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ /

note.p: anyat prāktanapauruṣāt | kṣayam anudyogakṛtaṃ nāśam ||

lg.l: adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava //

note.p: adyatanayeti śeṣaḥ | yathā adyatanayā satkriyayā hyastanī duṣkriyā śobhāṃ abhyeti | evam tathā | prāktanī prāgjanmabhavā°jan⟨bh⟩[ma]° vāsanārūpā duṣkriyā°kriy⟨ay⟩ā | adya adyatanayā sacchāstrasevanādirūpayā satkriyayā | śobhām śuddhatvam abhyeti | ataḥ tvam satkāryavān bhava ||

lg.l: karāmalakavad dṛṣṭaṃ pauruṣād eva yat phalam /

note.p: mūḍhaḥ daivāt phalavādī ajñānī | pratyakṣam pratyakṣapramāṇasiddhaṃ pauruṣam utsṛjya | daivamohe daivarūpe bhrame majjati | kutaḥ tat | tat kutaḥ yat yataḥ | asmābhiḥ phalam karāmalakavat pauruṣād eva dṛṣṭam pratyakṣam anubhūtam ||

lg.l:
tad anapekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ
śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam ātmanaḥ //

note.p: sakalāni yāni kāryakāraṇāni | taiḥ varjitam | atyantāsatsvarūpam ity arthaḥ | ata eva nijavikalpabalāt upakalpitam saṃpāditaṃ | tat asanmayaṃ daivam anapekṣya | he śubhāśaya | tvam ātmanaḥ pauruṣaṃ āśraya | daivavaśo mā bhaveti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l:
śāstraiḥ sadācaritajṛṃbhitadeśadharmair
yat kalpitaṃ phalam atīva ciraprarūḍham /

tasmin hṛdi sphurati no 'param eti cittam
aṅgāvalī tad anu pauruṣam etad āhuḥ //

note.p: śāstraiḥ sacchāstraiḥ | satāṃ sādhūnāṃ | yat ācaritaṃ ācāraḥ | tena pravṛttaḥ | avicchinnapravāheṇāgatāḥ ye deśadharmāḥ | taiḥ cātīva ciraprarūḍhaṃ°ḍha[ṃ] atyantabahukālāt prabhṛti prasiddhaṃ | yat phalaṃ kalpitam sādhyatvena niścitaṃ bhavati | tasmin phale | hṛdi sphurati saṃpādanīyatayā vilasati sati | cittam aparam proktaphaletaraṃp[r]okta° vastu yat | no eti na gacchati | tad anu cittānantaraṃ | aṅgāvalī hastādyavayavapaṅktir | api aparaṃ yat | no eti | api tu tatsādhanaikaparaṃ bhavati | paṇḍitāḥ etat pauruṣam āhuḥ kathayanti | na tu yathā tathā hastādicālanam iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l:
buddhvaiva pauruṣaphalaṃ puruṣatvam etad
ātmaprayatnaparataiva sadaiva kāryā /

neyā tataḥ saphalatāṃ paramām athāsau
sacchāstrasādhujanapaṇḍitasevanena //

note.p: puruṣeṇa etat svenānubhūyamānaṃ | puruṣatvam puruṣabhāvam | pauruṣaphalaṃ | pauruṣaṃ pūrvaślokoktasvarūpapauruṣaṃ | phalaṃ yasya | tādṛk | buddhvā eva | ātmaprayatnaparatā pauruṣanirvṛttatvam°ni[r]vṛ[tta]° | sadā eva kāryā | tataḥ karaṇānantaraṃ | puruṣeṇāsau ātmaprayatnaparatā | sacchāstrasādhujanapaṇḍitasevanena paramām utkṛṣṭām | saphalatām mokṣākhyaphalayuktatām neyā | athaśabdaḥ pādapūraṇārthaḥ ||

lg.l: nityam eva jayatīti bhāvitaiḥ kārya āryajanasevanodyamaḥ //

note.p: puruṣaiḥ āryajanasevanodyamaḥ kāryaḥ | kathaṃbhūtaiḥ | daivapauruṣayoḥ yaḥ vicāraḥ svarūpavivecanaṃ | tena cārubhiḥ | punaḥ kathaṃbhūtaiḥ | manasā iti evam | bhāvitaiḥ niścitaiḥ iti | kim iti | caritam anuṣṭhitam | ātmapauruṣam nityam sadā jayati | sarvaphalajanakatvāt sarvotkarṣeṇa vartata iti ||
sargāntaślokenāpy etad eva kathayati

lg.l:
janmaprabandhamayam āmayam eṣa jīvo
buddhvaihikaṃ sahajapauruṣam eva siddhyai /

śāntiṃ nayatv avitathena varauṣadhena
pṛṣṭena tuṣṭiparapaṇḍitasevanena //

note.p: jīvaḥ puruṣaḥ | aihikaṃ iha loke śakyatvena sthitaṃ pauruṣaṃ | siddhyai siddhyarthaṃ buddhvā | tataḥ tadāśrayaṇenānuṣṭhitena tuṣṭiparapaṇḍitasevanena hetunā | pṛṣṭena tasmād eva paṇḍitāt pṛṣṭena | avitathena saphalena | varauṣadhena samyagjñānākhyavarauṣadhena | janmaprabandhamayam janmasantānarūpaṃ | āmayam rogaṃ | śāntiṃ nayatu | iti śivam ||
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuvyavahāraprakaraṇe ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ ||
oṃ atyantopādeyatvena punar api pauruṣacarcām eva prastauti

lg.l: tathātmānaṃ samādadhyād yathā bhūyo na jāyate //

note.p: alpo yaḥ ādhiḥ jīvanopāyādinimittā cittapīḍā | tena vedhitam tāḍanāyuktam°n*ā*° kṛtam | samādadhyāt cinmātratattve samādhānayuktaṃ kuryāt ||

lg.l: iha cāmutra ca jayet sa saṃpūrṇābhivāñchitaḥ //

note.p: daivam anudyogarūpam daivam | saṃpūrṇe abhivāñchite bhogamokṣarūpe kāṅkṣite°pūrṇ⟨au⟩[e] °vāñchit⟨au⟩[e] °rūp⟨au⟩[e] kāṅkṣit⟨au⟩[e] yasya saḥ ||

lg.l: tete⟨r⟩ dharmam arthakāmau ca nāśayanty ātmavidviṣaḥ //

note.p: ātmavidviṭtvaṃ ca teṣāṃ bhogamokṣarūpātmakakāryanāśakatvāj jñeyam ||
ebhyaḥ saṃvidādispandebhyaḥ ||
saṃvittattvād°tat[t]vād eva pauruṣotthānaṃ kathayati

yathā yena prakāreṇa | saṃvedanam saṃvidaḥ sphuraṇam syāt | tathā tena prakāreṇa | cetaḥ antaḥspandam°spa[n]dam saṃkalpākhyām ceṣṭām | ṛcchati gacchati | tathaiva cittaspandānusāreṇa eva | kāyaḥ calati hitāhitaprāptiparihārarūpāṃ kriyāṃ prati ceṣṭate | tataḥ tathaiva kāyacalanānusāreṇaiva | phalabhoktṛtā bhavati | jīvasyeti śeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: ābālam etat saṃsiddhaṃ yatra yatra yathā tathā /
daivaṃ tu nan⟨u⟩[a] kvacid dṛṣṭam ato jayati pauruṣam //

note.p: ābālaṃ bālaparyantam | etat maduktam | phalitam āhāta iti ||
deveśasya guruḥ deveśaguruḥ ||
devendratulyatām indrasāmyam ||
doṣeṇa doṣahetunā°h⟨o⟩[e]tu° | ucchāstriteneti yāvat ||
vivṛttāḥ rūpāntaraṃ gatāḥ | bhāvābhāvādyāviṣṭāḥ saṃpannā iti yāvat ||

lg.l: śāstrato gurutaś caiva svataś ceti trisiddhitā /

note.p: tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ siddhitā trisiddhitā | phalam iti śeṣaḥ | svataḥ śāstrādi°ādi⟨ṃ⟩ vinā svapratibhāmātrād eva | kecid dhi śāstrāt siddhā bhavanti | kecit gurutaḥ | kecit svataḥ ||
aśubheṣu bhogārjanarūpeṣv aśubhakāryeṣu ||

lg.l: yac chreyo yad atucchaṃ ca yad apāyavivarjitam /
tat tad ācara yatnena putreti guravaḥ sthitāḥ //

note.p: putra he śiṣya | sthitāḥ | upadeṣṭṛtveneti śeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: yathā yathā prayatno me phalam āśu tathā tathā /
ity ahaṃ pauruṣād eva phalabhāṅ na tu daivataḥ //

note.p: ity evaṃ | niścayavān bhaved iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: pauruṣād dṛśyate siddhiḥ pauruṣaṃ dhīmatāṃ kramaḥ /

note.p: duḥkhena pelavā udyogāsahā | buddhiḥ yeṣāṃ teṣu ||

asmābhiḥ pauruṣaḥ puruṣasambandhī kramaḥ | pādacālanādirūpaṃ pauruṣam iti yāvat | deśāntaragamādikāt phalataḥ phalāt | nityaṃ pramāṇaṃ arthakriyākāri*kri* dṛśyate | phalataḥ kathaṃbhūtāt | pratyakṣaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaṃ | pramukhaṃ grāhakatvena pradhānaṃ yasya | tādṛśāt pratyakṣadṛṣṭād ity arthaḥ | ataḥ pauruṣam eva saphalaṃ | na daivam iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: bhoktā tṛpyati nābhoktā gantā gacchati nāgatiḥ /
vaktā vakti na cāvaktā pauruṣaṃ saphalaṃ nṛṇām //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||
mūkatayā daivaparatvarūpeṇadai*va* udyogarāhityena ||

lg.l: yo yo yathā prayatate°yatat(o)e sa sa tadvat phalaikabhāk /
na tu tūṣṇīṃ sthiteneha kenacit prāpyate phalam //

note.p: tadvat tathā | tūṣṇīṃ sthitena udyogarahitena tiṣṭhatā ||
spaṣṭam ||

lg.l: prāptā cireṇa śīghraṃ vā yāsau daivam iti smṛtā //

note.p: prāptiḥ prāpteti kāryaṃ karoti itivat prayogaḥ | asau puruṣārthaphalaprāptiḥ ||

lg.l: na daivaṃ dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā na ca lokāntare sthitam /
uktaṃ daivābhidhānena svaṃ loke karmaṇaḥ phalam //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||

lg.l: puruṣo jāyate loke vardhate kṣīyate punaḥ /

note.p: tatra puruṣe ||

lg.l: vyāpāraś ca tathāṅgānāṃ pauruṣeṇa na daivataḥ //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||
arthaprāpakaṃ yat kāryaṃ | tatra ekam kevalaṃ | prayatnaparatā ||
anarthaprāptau anarthaprāptyarthaṃ yat kāryam | tatra ekam prayatnaparatā ||
unnīyate niścīyate ||

lg.l: tad yebhyaḥ prāpyate yatnāt sevyās te śāstrasādhavaḥ //

note.p: svakam paramārtham nijaṃ paramaprayojanam ||

lg.l: vardhete te mitho 'bhyāsāt sarobdāv iva kālataḥ //

note.p: sacchāstrādirūpaḥ guṇaḥ matyā⟨s⟩[m]atyā bhavati | buddhirahitasya sacchāstrādau pravṛttyabhāvāt | matiḥ sacchāstrādiguṇāt bhavati | te sacchāstrādiguṇamatī | mithaḥ anyonyaṃ | abhyāsāt vardhete vṛddhiṃ gacchataḥ | kāv iva | sarobdāv iva | yathā sarobdau saromeghau | kālataḥ mithaḥ vardhete tathety arthaḥ | kadācid dhi saraḥ meghavṛṣṭena jalena vardhate | kadācit tu meghaḥ sarasaḥ gṛhītena jaleneti ||
puruṣayatnena pauruṣeṇābhyastaiḥ anuśīlitaiḥ | svaḥ arthaḥ mokṣākhyaṃ nijaṃ prayojanam ||

lg.l: racitāni jagantīha viṣṇunā na tu daivataḥ //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||
sargāntaślokena śrīrāmasya pauruṣaṃ kartavyatvenopadiśati

lg.l:
jagati puruṣakārakāraṇe 'smin
kuru raghunātha ciraṃ tathā prayatnam /

vrajasi tarusarīsṛpābhidhānāṃ
subhaga yathā na daśām aśaṅkam eva //

note.p: jagati kathaṃbhūte | puruṣakāraḥ pauruṣaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasya | tādṛśe | cinmātrapauruṣād eva hi jagad utpannam | prayatnam pauruṣam | tarusarīsṛpābhidhānāṃ daśāṃ tarvādirūpatām ity arthaḥ | tarvādayo hi pauruṣarāhityenaiva duḥkham anubhavantīti teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ kṛtam | iti śivam ||
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuvyavahāraprakaraṇe saptamaḥ sargaḥ ||
oṃ punaḥ daivanirākaraṇaṃ karoti | oṃ

lg.l: nākṛtir na ca karmāṇi nāspadaṃ na parākramaḥ /
tan mithyājñānavat prauḍhaṃ daivaṃ nāma kim ucyate //

note.p: pūrvārdhe yasyeti śeṣaḥ ||
idam ittham iti giragira(ḥ) idaṃ itthaṃ saṃpannam iti vācaḥ ||
āttoā(r)tto gṛhītaḥ | duravabodhena ajñānena | ivaśabdaḥ yathāśābdārthe ||

lg.l: adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava //

note.p: gatārtho 'yam ||

lg.l: daivād dāho 'stu mā veti vaktavyaṃ tena pāvake //

note.p: mūḍhānumānasaṃsiddhaṃ daivaṃ yasya durmateḥ ajñāninaḥ | asti paramārthasad°sa⟨n⟩[d] asti | tena durmatinā | pāvake agnau sthitvā | daivād dāhaḥ astu māstu veti vaktavyam | tatra tv asau naitad vaktuṃ śaknoti dāhaikalabdher iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: daivam eveha cet karma puṃsaḥ kim iva ceṣṭayā /

note.p: karma karmasaṃpādakam ity arthaḥ | na caitat saṃbhavati akiṃcitkurvataḥ snānādyanupapatter iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: kiṃ vā śāstropadeśena mūko 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ kila /

note.p: saṃcāryate saṃcaraṇaśīlaḥ saṃpādyate | kim iti | kena iti śeṣaḥ | daivāṅgīkāre na ko 'pi kasyāpy upadeśaṃ kuryād iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: na ca niḥspandatā loke dṛṣṭeha śavatāṃ vinā /
spandaś ca phalasaṃprāptis tasmād daivaṃ nirarthakam //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||
nanu daivena sahaiva puruṣaḥ kāryaṃ karotīty | atrāha

lg.l: hastādīn īhataś caiva na daivena kvacit kṛtam ||

note.p: amūrtena mūrtirahitenamūr⟨h⟩[t]i° daivena | hastādīn īhataḥ ceṣṭataḥ | mūrtasya puruṣasya | sahakartṛtā ca na bhavati | ataḥ daivena kṛtam daivakartṛkaṃ kāryaṃ | kvacit na bhavati ||
nanu manobuddhyādivad amūrtasyāpi daivasya mūrtena saha kartṛtvam asty evety | atrāha

lg.l: āgopālaṃ kila prājñais tena daivam asat sadā //

note.p: mṛtaśarīre kartṛtvādarśanān manobuddhī kalpyete | na ca daivasyātra kaścid upayoga iti | na tatkalpanāvasara iti bhāvaḥ ||
nanu kadācit tasmād eva dṛśyātdṛśyā(ḥ)*t* śarīrādeḥ kāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kadācin na dṛṣṭam iti adṛṣṭasya daivasya kalpanā yuktaivety | atrāha

lg.l: pṛthak ced buddhir anyo 'rthaḥ saiva cet kānyatā tayoḥ /
kalpanā vā pramāṇaṃ cet pauruṣaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate //

note.p: buddhiḥ jñānaṃ | pṛthak cet yady asti | tadārthaḥ anya ekasmāt dvitīyaḥ pṛthag iti yāvat | asti buddhiḥ sā eva | na tu bhinnā ced bhavati | tadā tayoḥ arthayoḥ kā anyatā bhavati | ato 'tra kevalasaddṛśyāc°val[a]° charīrāder eva kāryaṃ bhavatv iti bhāvaḥ | nanv atra buddhipṛthaktvopayogo nāsti | kalpanāyā eva pramāṇatvād ity | atrāha | kalpaneti | kalpanā prathamaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti ced | vāsti | tadā pauruṣaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate | kalpanayā saṃbhāvyate samānanyāyatvāt ||
punar api prakṛtaṃ mūrtāmūrtayoḥ sahakartṛtvāsaṃbhavam eva kathayati

lg.l: mūrtaṃ ca dṛśyate lagnaṃ tasmād daivaṃ na vidyate //

note.p: vapuṣmataḥ mūrtasya śarīriṇaḥ | amūrtena mūrtirahitena°te[na] daivena | saṅgaḥ sahakartṛtvaṃ nāsti | keneva | nabhasā iva | nanu tathāpi amūrtam eva kartṛ bhavatv ity | atrāha | mūrtaṃ ceti | asmābhiḥ mūrtam eva lagnaṃ kāryalagnaṃ dṛśyate | ataḥ tasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ | phalitaṃ kathayati | tasmād iti | tasmāt tato hetoḥ | daivaṃ na vidyate | tatkalpanāyāḥ nirastatvāt ||
viniyoktā prerakaḥ | anyad daivākhyaṃ anyat vastu | śeratām kāryeṣv anudyogaṃ bhajantām ||
īdṛśam sthitam īdṛśam saṃpannam ||

lg.l: mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivaṃ tatparās te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ /
prājñās°jñ⟨a⟩[ā]s tu puruṣārthena padam uttamam āgatāḥ //

note.p: tatparāḥ svayaṃkalpitadaivaparāḥ | te mūḍhāḥ | puruṣārthena pauruṣeṇa | uttamaṃ padam mokṣākhyam utkṛṣṭaṃ sthānam ||

lg.l: ye śūrā ye ca vikrāntā ye prājñā ye ca paṇḍitāḥ /
tais taiḥ kair iva loke 'smin vada daivaṃ pracakṣyate //

note.p: pracakṣyate kathyate | na kenāpi pracakṣyate iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: sa cej jīvati saṃchinnaśirās tad daivam uttamam //

note.p: kālavidbhiḥ daivajñaiḥ ||

lg.l: anadhyāpita evāsau tajjñaś ced daivam uttamam //

note.p: tajjñaḥ paṇḍitaḥ ||
spaṣṭam ||

lg.l: amībhir na parai rāma puruṣair munitāṃ gataiḥ /

note.p: amībhiḥ pauruṣayuktair ebhir eva | paraiḥ pauruṣarahitaiḥ sāmānyajantubhiḥ | gaganagamitā paramākāśacāritvam ||
utsādya bādhitvā | devasaṃghātān devasamūhān | dānaveśvarāḥ hiraṇyākṣyādayaḥ ||
ālūnaśīrṇam aticañcalam ||

lg.l: rāma pauruṣayuktyaiva salilaṃ dhāryate na vā /
ciraṃ karaṇḍake yuktyā na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam //

note.p: karaṇḍake randhrayukte kāṇḍasādhite dravyaviśeṣe | kenacit prayogena hi karaṇḍe 'pi jalaṃ tiṣṭhati ||

lg.l: śaktatā dṛśyate rāma na daivasyauṣadherd⟨e⟩[ai]va° iva //

note.p: haraṇetyādy upalakṣaṇaṃ sarvakriyāṇām ||
sargāntaślokenaitat samāpayati

lg.l:
tvam anavekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ
śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam uttamam //

note.p: gatārtho 'yam | iti śivam ||
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe 'ṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ ||
oṃ atra śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati

lg.l: yal loke tad vada brahman daivam evaṃ kim ucyate //

note.p: he bhagavan | brahman vasiṣṭha | kathaṃbhūta | sarvadharmajña | tvam vada | yat daivam loke evam pratiṣṭhām prasiddhim | āgataṃ | tat paṇḍitaiḥ kiṃrūpaṃ kathyate | na hi asiddhaṃ vastu prasiddhim āyāti iti bhāvaḥ ||
śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati

lg.l: phalabhoktṛ ca sarvatra na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam //

note.p: he rāghava | pauruṣaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ kartṛ bhavati | itarat anyat daivādi | kartṛ na bhavati | na kevalaṃ kartr eva | kiṃ tu phalabhoktṛ ca bhavati | svāviṣṭapuruṣadvāreṇeti bhāvaḥ | daivaṃ tatra kāraṇaṃ na bhavati | ato daivaṃ nāstīti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: daivaṃ na kiṃcit kurute na ca bhuṅkte na vidyate /

note.p: īdṛśī daivam eva sarvaṃ karotīty evaṃrūpā | na ca kalpanāyāḥ satyatvam iti bhāvaḥ ||
paṇḍitaiḥ phalaśālināṃ phalabhājāṃ | pauruṣeṇa śubhāśubhena pauruṣeṇa | siddhasya phalasya śubhā aśubhā vā saṃpattiḥ daivaśabdena kathyate | ajñavyavahārārtham iti śeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: prāptir iṣṭāpy aniṣṭā vā daivaśabdena kathyate //

note.p: paṇḍitaiḥ pauruṣe uparatā niṣṭhāṃ gatā | iṣṭāniṣṭasya vastunaḥ iṣṭā aniṣṭā vā prāptiḥ daivaśabdena kathyate*iṣṭāniṣṭasya ... kathyate* | apiśabdaḥ pādapūraṇārthaḥ ||
bhāvī bhavanaśīlaḥ | puruṣārthaḥ pauruṣam ekaṃ sādhanaṃ yasya | tādṛśaḥ | lokasaṃghāte lokasamūhe ||

lg.l: na tu rāghava lokasya kasyacit kiṃcid eva hi /
daivam ākāśakalpaṃ hi karoti na karoti vā //

note.p: hi yasmādarthe | ākāśakalpam ākāśavad atyantatuccham | na hi vandhyāsutaḥ kasyacit kiṃcit°ci[t] karoti na karoti veti bhāvaḥ | dvitīyo hiśabdaḥ niścaye ||

lg.l: idam itthaṃ sthitam iti yoktis tad daivam ucyate //

note.p: ukteḥ svarūpaṃ kathayati | idam itthaṃ sthitamsthi(r)*t*am itīti | siddhamsi⟨---⟩[ddham] saṃpannam ||

lg.l: itthaṃ mamābhavad buddhir itthaṃ me niścayo hy abhūt /
iti karmaphalāvāptau yoktis tad daivam ucyate //

note.p: itthaṃ karmaphalasādhanarūpā | karmaphalasyāvāptau prāptau | uktimātram eva daivam iti bhāvaḥ ||
āśvāsanāmātravacaḥ kathaṃbhūtaṃ | evam | iti yaḥ arthaḥ | tasya vācakam niyamavācakam ity arthaḥ ||

lg.l: tad etad daivam ity uktam apamṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tvayā //

note.p: prāk pitrantargatabījatāvasthāyām | apamṛṣṭam nāśitam ||
śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati

lg.l: sādhu rāghava jānāsi śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te 'khilam /
daivaṃ nāstīti te yena sthirā buddhir bhaviṣyati //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||
tad eva kathayati

lg.l: yā magnā vāsanā pūrvaṃ babhūva kila bhūriśaḥ /

note.p: pūrvam pitrantargatabījatāvasthāyām | bhūriśaḥ bhūriprakāreṇa | vartamānā yā vāsanā śubhāśubhā vā bhāvanā | magnā | bīje iti śeṣaḥ bhavati | sā eveyaṃ nṝṇāṃ karmabhāvena karmarūpeṇa | pariṇatiṃ rūpāntaraṃ | gatā | tadanurūpam eva sarve karma kurvantīti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: jantur yadvāsano nāma tatkarmā bhavati kṣaṇāt /

note.p: anyabhāvaḥ anyavāsanā ||

lg.l: grāmago grāmam āpnoti pattanārthī ca pattanam /
yo yo yadvāsanas tat tat sa sa prayatate tathā //

note.p: grāmagasya ca grāmagamanavāsanā sphuṭā evānyathā na yāyāt ||

lg.l: yad eva tīvrasaṃvegād iha karma kṛtaṃ purā /
tad eva daivaśabdena paryāyeṇa hi kathyate //

note.p: iha ihalokaparalokatayā dvirūpe saṃsāre | purā pitrantargatabījatāvasthāyām | karmakaraṇaṃ cātra pitṛdvāreṇaiva jñeyam ||
upasaṃhāraṃ karoti

lg.l: evaṃ daivaṃ svakarmāṇi karma prauḍhā svavāsanā /
vāsanā manaso nānyā mano hi puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ //

note.p: evam anena prakāreṇa | svakarmāṇi prāk kṛtāni nijakarmāṇi | daivaṃ bhavati | prauḍhā vāsanā karma bhavati | tadanusāreṇaiva tasya prakṛtatvātpra(vṛ)kṛ° | vāsanā manasaḥ anyā na bhavati | hi niścaye | manaḥ puruṣaḥ bhavati | ataḥ daivasya puruṣād vyatiriktā sattā nāstīti bhāvaḥ ||
punar apy etad eva kathayati

lg.l: yad daivaṃ tāni karmāṇi karma sādho mano hi tat /
mano hi puruṣas tasmād daivaṃ nāstīti niścayaḥ //

note.p: karmety atra yacchabdādhyāhāraḥ | yat karma | tat mano bhavati ||

lg.l: ekam eva mano jantor yathā prayatate hi yat /
nūnaṃ tat tad avāpnoti svata eva na daivataḥ //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||

lg.l: manaś cittaṃ vāsanā ca karma daivaṃ svaniścayaḥ /

note.p: puṃniścayasya puṃrūpasya niścayasya | puruṣasyeti yāvat ||

lg.l: nityaṃ prayatate rāma phalam āpnoty alaṃ tathā //

note.p: evaṃnāmā mana ityādināmayuktaḥ ||
upasaṃhāraṃ karoti

lg.l: prāpyate netareṇeha tasmāt sa śubhado 'stu te //

note.p: saḥ puruṣakāraḥ | śubhado jīvanmuktākhyaśubhaphalapradaḥ°bha⟨te⟩pha° | te ity upalakṣaṇam | tena sarveṣāṃ śubhaphalapradaḥ bhavatu ity arthaḥ ||
śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati

lg.l: mune tathaiva tiṣṭhāmi kṛpaṇaḥ kiṃ karomy aham //

note.p: ataḥ pauruṣaṃ kiṃcid api nāstīti bhāvaḥ ||
śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati

lg.l: ata eva hi he rāma śreyaḥ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam /

note.p: hi niścaye | ata eva pūrvoktāt kāraṇād eva | pauruṣeṇa kathaṃbhūtena | svaprayatnopanītena | rāhoḥ śira itivad ayaṃ prayogaḥ ||

lg.l: dvividho vāsanāvyūhaḥ śubhaś caivāśubhaś ca te /
prāktano vidyate rāma dvayor ekataro 'tha vā //

note.p: vāsanāvyūhaḥ vāsanāsamūhaḥ | atha vā pakṣāntare | dvayoḥ madhye | ekataraḥ śubhaḥ aśubho vā asti ||

lg.l: vāsanaughena śuddhena tatra ced adya nīyase /
tat krameṇa śubhenaiva padaṃ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam //

note.p: nīyase svānusāreṇa°s⟨v⟩ā° karma kāryase | padam mokṣākhyaṃ sthānaṃ ||

lg.l: atha ced aśubho bhāvas tvāṃ yojayati saṅkaṭe /
prāktanas tad asau yatnāj jetavyo bhavatā balāt //

note.p: aśubho bhāvaḥ aśubhā vāsanā | balāt haṭhāt ||
nanv anyaḥ cetanārūpaḥ kaścin māṃ prerayati | tat katham ahaṃ svayaṃ kiṃcit kartuṃ śaknomīty | atrāha

lg.l: prājña°jña⟨ś⟩ cetanāmātras°n⟨a⟩[ā]mā° tvaṃ na dehas tvaṃ jaḍātmakaḥ /
tad eva cetasy anyena cet tat tvaṃ kveva vidyase //

note.p: he prājña | asmiñ śloke vakṣyamāṇe upadeśe yogyatvam | cetanāmātraḥ asi tvam | jaḍaḥ dehaḥ nāsi | tad eva cetanāmātram eva san | tvam anyena°na⟨ṃ⟩ hetukartṛbhūtena kṛtvā | cet yadi | cetasi citikriyāṃ prati kartṛtvaṃ bhajasi | tat tadā | tvam na vidyase nāsi | tasyaiva sattvāt | na hi dvayoḥ sattā yuktā vyarthatvāt ||
punar api pūrvaślokottarārdhaniścitam artham eva kathayati

lg.l: anyas tvāṃ cetayati cet tat tvayy asati ko 'paraḥ /
kam imaṃ cetayet tasmād anavasthā na vāstavī //

note.p: anyaḥ tvām cet cetayati citikriyākartṛtvam°tvam⟨aḥ asiḥ⟩ prerayati | tat tadā | tvayi asati pūrvoktayuktyā sattām abhajati sati | sa iti⟨s(a)ot(i)ā⟩ [sa iti] kam imam kiṃrūpam°pa⟨s⟩[m] | idantāspandaṃ°spa[n]da° tvāṃ | cetayet citikriyākartṛtvaṃ prati prerayet | na hy asataḥ preraṇaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ | ataḥ anyaḥ kaścit preryaḥ kalpanīyaḥ | so 'pi tvatsamānayogakṣema eveti kutrāpi preryatayā viśrāntir na syād | ataḥ tvam eva preryaprerakabhāvena sthito 'sīty abhiprāyeṇopasaṃhāraṃ karoti | tasmād iti | tasmāt tato hetoḥ | anavasthā preryānavasthitiḥ | vāstavī paramārthabhūtā | na bhavati | tavaiva preryaprerakatvābhyāṃ sthitatvāt | ato na kaścit tavānyaḥ prerakaḥ astīti bhāvaḥ ||
prakṛtam anusarati
yojanīyā pravartanīyā | bhogatyāgaparāmarśākhyaṃ śubhānusandhānam eva satataṃ kāryam iti bhāvaḥ ||
samāviṣṭam saṃlīnam | avatārayet nayet ||

lg.l: aśubhāc calitaṃ yāti śubhaṃ tasmād apītarat /
jantoś cittaṃ tu paśuvat tasmāt tat pālayed balāt //

note.p: aśubhāt bhogārjanaparāmarśarūpāt aśubhānusandhānāt | tasmād api śubhād api | pālayed°ye[d] aśubhāt rakṣet ||

lg.l: samatāsāntvanenāśu na drāg iti śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /

note.p: samatā sarvam idaṃ brahmety evaṃrūpā buddhiḥ | tayā yat sāntvanam samāśvāsanaṃ tena | na drāg iti na jhaṭiti | etasyārthaṃ svakaṇṭhena kathayati | śanaiḥ śanair iti samyagvicāreṇa | na tu prāṇarodhanādirūpeṇa haṭhenety arthaḥ ||

lg.l: śubho vāpy aśubho rāma śubham adya ghanīkuru //

note.p: adya | madupadeśeneti śeṣaḥ ||
abhyāsasya samastasyābhyāsasya ||

lg.l: idānīm api te yāti ghanatāṃ vāsanānagha /

note.p: idānīm asmin janmani | upāhara ānaya ||

lg.l: pūrvaṃ ced ghanatāṃ yātā nābhyāsāt tava vāsanā /
vardhiṣyate tu nedānīm api tāta sukhī bhava //

note.p: vāsanārāhityamātrasyaiva parame pade yatatvāt°t[a]tvāt iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: saṃdigdhāyām api bhṛśaṃ śubham eva samāhara /
asyāṃ tu vāsanāvṛddhau śubhād doṣo na kaścana //

note.p: asyāṃ vāsanāvṛddhau saṃdigdhāyām kim abhyāsād vardhate na veti sandehaviṣayāyām°[yā]yām api satyāṃ | tvaṃ bhṛśaṃ śubham eva samāhara abhyāsaviṣayīkuru | yataḥ śubhāt kaścana doṣo na bhavati ||
sandehasyāyuktatāṃ kathayati

lg.l: yad yad abhyasyate loke°k⟨o⟩[e] tanmayenaiva bhūyate /

note.p: loke saṃsāre | puruṣeṇeti śeṣaḥ ||

lg.l: śubhavāsanayā yuktas tad atra bhava bhūtaye /

note.p: bhūtaye jīvanmuktākhyasaṃpatprāptaye°v⟨i⟩[a]nmu° ||
avyutpannamanāḥ jñānarahitaḥ | ata evājñātatatpadaḥ ajñātabrahmākhyotkṛṣṭasthānaḥ | nirṇītam tatpadanirṇayam | bhāve ktaprayoge nirṇītam iti siddham ||

lg.l: śubho 'py asau tvayā tyājyo bhāvanaugho nirādhinā //

note.p: kaṣāyapākena lakṣaṇayā parakoṭiprāptyā | bhāvanaughaḥ nirṇayarūpaḥ vāsanāsamūhaḥ | nirādhinā śubhavāsanākhyacittapīḍārahitena ||
sargāntaślokena śrīrāmasyāvasthānam anuṣṭheyatvenopadiśati

lg.l:
yad atisubhagam āryasevitaṃ tac
chubham anusṛtya manojñabhāvabuddhyā /

adhigamaya padaṃ sadāviśokaṃ
tad anu tad apy avamucya sādhu tiṣṭha //

note.p: tvaṃ | yat atisubhagam ata evāryasevitam bhavati | tac chubhaṃ*bhavati tac chubhaṃ* pauruṣam | manojñabhāvā śubhavāsanā yā matiḥ | tayā karaṇabhūtayā | anusṛtya satatānuṣṭhānaviṣayatāṃ nītvā | aviśokaṃ duḥkharahitaṃ | padaṃ jīvanmuktirūpaṃ sthānaṃ | adhigamaya prāpnuhi | ārṣaḥ svārthe ṇic | tad anu kālāntare | tad api jīvanmuktipadam api avamucya | sādhu samyak | tiṣṭha videhamuktau sthirībhavety arthaḥ | iti śivam ||
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe navamaḥ sargaḥ ||
oṃ paramam upasaṃhāraṃ karoti

lg.l: ekāgraṃ kuru cittaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu coktam idaṃ mama //

note.p: uktam upadeśam ||

avāntareṣu bhogarūpeṣu madhyameṣu viśrāntisthāneṣu | na tu paramātmarūpe parame viśrāntisthāne | abhipātīni patanaśīlāni | manorathaṃ cittānusandhānam | svārūḍhāni suṣṭhu ārūḍhāni | indriyāṇi saṃyamya pratyāhṛtya | samatāṃ rāgadveṣarahitatvam naya | anyathā na śroṣyasīti bhāvaḥ ||
mokṣopāyamayīṃ mokṣasya yaḥ upāyaḥ tanmayīm tadvācakām ity arthaḥ | saṃhitām śāstram | sārasammitām sāratulyām ||

lg.l: mokṣopāyam imaṃ rāma vakṣyamāṇaṃ mayā śṛṇu //

note.p: he rāma | tvaṃ mayā vakṣyamāṇaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ śṛṇu | kiṃ kṛtvā | apunargrahaṇāyetyādi | suṣuptau tyaktām api vāsanāṃ puruṣaḥ punaḥ gṛhṇātīti apunargrahaṇāyety uktam | antaḥ manasi | anyathā na śrotuṃ śaknoṣīti bhāvaḥ | ādāya gṛhītvā | manaḥ kathaṃbhūtaṃ | ātmani samarasam ekarasam | na tu viṣayeṣu vikṣiptaṃ | tathā sapūrvāparaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ yaḥ vākyārthavicāraḥ | sa eva viṣayaḥ saṃcārasthānam | tatrādṛtam ||

lg.l: imāṃ mokṣakathāṃ śrutvā saha sarvair vivekibhiḥ /
padaṃ yāsyasi nirduḥkhaṃ nāśo yatra na vidyate //

note.p: padam viśrāntisthānam ||
evaṃ śrīrāmasya pauruṣam āśrayaṇīyatvenopadiśya viśvāmitrapreraṇayāpr⟨a⟩[e]raṇ⟨ī⟩[a]yā smṛtaṃ brahmoktam upadeśaṃ kathayituṃ prastāvaṃ karoti
idaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ | dhiyaḥ buddheḥ | paramāśvāsanam utkṛṣṭaṃ āśvāsanakāri ||
śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati

lg.l: kathaṃ ca bhavatā prāptam etat kathaya me prabho //

note.p: idaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānam ||
śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati

cidākāśaḥ cid iti nāmadheyaḥ ākāśaḥ cidākāśaḥ | saḥ asti paramārthasan bhavati | kathaṃbhūtaḥ | anantāḥ aparicchinnāḥ | ye vilāsāḥ sargāvabhāsanasaṃkocanarūpāḥ vilāsāḥ te | ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya saḥ | tathā sarvagaḥ sarvavyāpakatvāt upacāreṇa sarvagantā | na hi mukhyaṃ sarvagatvam asya saṃbhavati niṣkriyatvena gamikriyānāśrayatvāt°yā*nā*śra° | punaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ | sarveṣām samastānāṃ bhāvābhāvasvarūpāṇāṃ padārthānāṃ | saṃśrayaḥ sphūrtipradatvena sattāpradatvena cāśrayaḥ | punaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ | avināśātmā vināśasyāpi sākṣitayā sattāpradatvena ca tena rahitaḥ ātmā yasya saḥ | na hi svasphūrtipradasya svasattāpādakasya ca kaścit āvaraṇaṃ kartuṃ śaktaḥ tadāvṛtau svasyāpy asiddhatvāt | punaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ | sarvavastuṣu pradīpaḥ prakāśakatvāt | nanu kutrāsāv astīti cen | na | sarvatra vartamānasya kutreti vaktum aśakyatvāt | nanu tathāpi kathaṃ nāsau sarvatra dṛśyate iti ced | asad etat | draṣṭrekasvarūpe tasmin kathaṃ na dṛśyata ity asyāpi vaktum aśakyatvāt | tathāpi ko 'sāv iti cet | yaḥ pṛcchati sa eveti brūmaḥ | nanu kaḥ pṛcchati iti cet | ahantayā atiprākaṭyena bhāsamānaḥ saḥ svayam eva svāntaḥ vicāryatām ity alaṃ rahasyodghāṭanena ||
tataḥ kim ity | atrāha

spandāspandayoḥ sṛṣṭyāveśaudāsīnyayoḥ°au⟨y⟩[d]āsī° samākārāt cittvākhyasamānākārayuktāt | tataḥ tasmāc cidākāśāt | viṣṇuḥ bhāvisṛṣṭisthitikārī°vi⟨ṃ⟩sṛ° nārāyaṇākhyo devatāviśeṣaḥ | samaṣṭirūpaṃ śuddhabuddhitattvaṃ cājāyata°t(e)a | saṃhārakāraṇasya śuddhāhaṅkārarūpasya rudrasya kathanaṃ sṛṣṭimātrakathanākāṅkṣayā°nā(ṃ)*kāṃ*kṣa° na kṛtam | viṣṇuḥ ka iva | taraṅga iva | yathā spandamānarasāpūrāt sāgarāt taraṅgaḥ jāyate tathety arthaḥ ||

tasya nārāyaṇasya śuddhabuddhitattvasya ca | sumerukarṇikāt tathā tārakākesarāt hṛdayāmbujāt hṛtkamalāt tadantargatāt brahmāṇḍāt iti yāvat | bhāvisarvajagadādhāratvayogyāt svarūpaleśāc°śā⟨ś⟩[c] ca | parameṣṭhī bhāvisṛṣṭyutpattikārī brahmākhyo devatāviśeṣaḥ | samaṣṭirūpaṃ śuddhamanastattvaṃ ca vyajāyata ||

lg.l: so 'sṛjat sakalaṃ sargaṃ vikalpaughaṃ yathā manaḥ //

note.p: sakalaṃ jagat bāhyatvena bhāsamānaṃ samastaṃ jagat | samaṣṭibhūtaśuddhamanastattvarūpāt | parameṣṭhina eva hi sarvaṃ jagad utpannam | atropamānatvaṃ vyaṣṭirūpasya manasaḥ jñeyam | samaṣṭirūpasya manasaḥma⟨l⟩[n]a° upameyatvāt ||
janam mānavajanam | putraiḥ prajāpatibhiḥ kṛtvā sāmānyajanaiś ca ||
janaṃ viśinaṣṭi

lg.l: janasya tasya duḥkhaṃ sad dṛṣṭvā sakalalokakṛt /
jagāma karuṇām īśaḥ putraduḥkhād yathā pitā //

note.p: tasya janasya mānavajanasya | īśaḥ brahmā śuddhamanastattvaṃ ca | karuṇāṃ dayām | atra ca śuddhamanasaḥ karuṇā sṛjyamānasmṛtikāracittāveśadvāreṇa jñeyety alaṃ rahasyodghāṭanena ||
nanu tataḥ kim akarod ity | atrāha

lg.l: syād iti kṣaṇam ekāgraś cintayām āsa bhūtapaḥ //

note.p: hatāśānāṃ naṣṭānāṃ | hatāyuṣāṃ naśvarāṇāṃ | antaḥ avasānaṃ ||
brahmaṇaḥ cintām upasaṃharati

lg.l: iti saṃcintya bhagavān sasarja punar īśvaraḥ /
tapo dharmaṃ ca dānaṃ ca satyaṃ tīrthāni caiva ha //

note.p: sasarja svayaṃ | kṛteṣu smṛtiśāstreṣu janān prati kartavyatvena dṛṣṭavān ity arthaḥ ||

lg.l: etat sṛṣṭvā punar devaś cintayām āsa bhūtakṛt /

note.p: spaṣṭam ||
punaḥ kena puṃsāṃ sarvasya duḥkhasyāntaḥ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkya cintayati

lg.l: nirvāṇaṃ nāma paramaṃ sukhaṃ yena punar janaḥ /
na jāyate na mriyate taj jñānād eva labhyate //

note.p: tan nirvāṇaṃ kena syād ity āśaṅkya cintayati | taj jñānād iti | tat nirvāṇam | jñānāt eva paramātmatattvajñānāt eva | na tu tapaḥprabhṛtibhyaḥ labhyate ||
evakāraprayogayogyatāṃ svayamsva⟨v⟩[y]am eva sādhayati

lg.l: saṃsārottaraṇe jantor upāyo jñānam eva hi /

note.p: aṇūpāyaḥ avāntaropāyaḥ ||

note.p: atra śuddhamanaḥsparśaḥ mayi jātaḥ iti bhaṅgyā uktam ||

lg.l: ahaṃ vismṛtavān sarvaṃ svarūpam amalaṃ dvijaḥ //

note.p: ahaṃ dvijaḥ vasiṣṭhākhyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ | svaṃ svarūpaṃ | vismṛtavān vyasmārṣam iti sambandhaḥ ||
asaṃbuddhayā niścayarahitayā ||

note.p: aham iti cintitavān iti saṃbandhaḥ | etena ajñānitvānantaram svasya vairāgyaprādurbhāvaḥ sūcitaḥ ||

lg.l: athābhyadhāt sa māṃ tātaḥ putra kiṃ duḥkhavān asi /
duḥkhopaghātaṃ māṃ pṛccha sukhī nityaṃ bhaviṣyasi //

note.p: athābhyadhāt uktavān | etena vairāgyānantaram mama jñānaṃ prati aunmukhyaṃ jātam iti sūcitam ||
nanu tatas tvayā kiṃ kṛtam ity | atrāha

lg.l: tataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sa bhagavān mayā sakalalokakṛt /

note.p: etena mayā svayam eva vimarṣaḥ kṛta iti sūcitam ||

kathaṃ ca kṣīyate jantor iti pṛṣṭena tena me //
taj jñānaṃ subahu proktaṃ yaj jñātvā pāvanaṃ param /
ahaṃ pitur api prāyaḥ kilādhika iva sthitaḥ //

note.p: pituḥ ādhikyam śuddhamanastattvātilaṅghanena(a)śu° prāptā cinmātratā jñeyā | etena svasya svataḥsiddhatvam°ta*ḥ*si° uktam | trividhā hi siddhāḥ uttarottaram utkarṣavantaḥ santi | gurutaḥ śāstrataḥ svata iti ||
mayi idaṃ sphuritam ity āntaro 'bhiprāyaḥ ||

lg.l: śāpenājñapadaṃ nītvā pṛcchakas tvaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ /

note.p: mama madhye evedam ajñatvaṃ prādurbhūtam āsīt iti mama sphuritam iti bhāvaḥ ||
punaḥ kim uvācety | atrāha

note.p: idānīm ahaṃ jñānī jāta ity api mama sphuritam iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l:
kartavyam asti mama neha hi kiṃcid eva
sthātavyam ity abhimanā bhuvi saṃsthito 'smi /

saṃśāntayā satatasuptadhiyeva vṛttyā
kāryaṃ karomi na ca kiṃcid ahaṃ karomi //

note.p: hi niścaye | mama samastajñānisantānasya vasiṣṭhākhyasya ca | iha loke | kiṃcit°cit⟨d⟩ eva kartavyaṃ nāsti paramātmatattvaprāptyā kṛtakṛtyatvāt | tathāpi aham bhuvi bhūmau | saṃsthitaḥ asmi | kathaṃbhūtaḥ | sthātavyam mayā ihāvaśyaṃ | niyatyanurodhena°anu(na)ro° sthātavyam iti evam abhimanāḥ abhiniviṣṭamanāḥ niścitamanā iti yāvat | ahaṃ saṃśāntayā lābhālābhānusandhānarūpakṣobharahitayā vṛttyā vā | pāreṇa kāryam śarīrayātrānimittaṃ karma | akaraṇe pratyavāyanimittaṃ nityaṃ karma ca karomi | vṛttyā kayā iva | satatasuptā yā dhīḥ | tayā ivātyantaśāntayety arthaḥ | tathāpi ahaṃ kiṃcid api na ca karomi nāhaṃ karteti niścayānubhāvād ity arthaḥ | iti śivam ||
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe daśamaḥ sargaḥ ||
pūrvasargoktasyopasaṃhārakāṅkṣayā°rv⟨o⟩[a]° parāmarśaṃ karoti

lg.l: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ jñānāvataraṇaṃ bhuvi /

note.p: svam īhitam nijaceṣṭitam | kamalodbhavena brahmaṇā śuddhamanastattvena ca | kalpitam āvirbhāvitaṃ iti | anena prakāreṇaiveha jñānam ihāvatīrṇam iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: tad idaṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śrotum adya tavānagha /

note.p: tat brahmaṇā uktam ||

lg.l: jātaḥ spandamayo nityam ūrmir ambunidhāv iva //

note.p: parame utkṛṣṭacinmātrasvarūpe°kṛṣ⟨ṇ⟩[ṭ]a° | spandamayaḥ parimitāhaṃparāmarśamayaḥ ||

lg.l: sṛṣṭvaivam ātataṃ sargaṃ sargasya sakalā gatīḥ /

note.p: dadarśa | jñānanetreṇeti śeṣaḥ ||

note.p: moham bhaviṣyantam ity arthaḥ ||

lg.l: tato mām īśvaraḥ sṛṣṭvā jñānenāyojya cāsakṛt /

note.p: mām vasiṣṭhākhyaṃ mām | jñānena paramātmajñānena | āyojya saṃyojya ||
etena ye bhūtā bhaviṣyantaś copadeṣṭāraḥ santi tatrāpīyam eva rītir astīti sūcitam ||
īritāḥ visarjitāḥ | kiṃ kartum | lokam adhikāribhedāt kriyākrameṇa jñānakrameṇa ca uddhartum | lokaṃ kathaṃbhūtam | mana eva mahāmayaḥ mahārogaḥ | tenottabdham baddham ||

lg.l: maharṣibhis tatas tais tu kṣīṇe kṛtayuge purā /
kramāt kriyākrame śuddhe pṛthivyāṃ tanutāṃ gate //

note.p: spaṣṭam ||
parikalpitāni kṛtāni | maharṣibhir iti śeṣaḥ | yalya⟨dā⟩[l] lokaiḥ teṣām upadeśaḥ na śruta iti bhāvaḥ | athaśabdaḥ uttaraślokena saṃbandhanīyaḥ°ya(ā)ḥ ||

lg.l: kālacakre vahaty asmiṃs tato vigalite krame /

note.p: dvandvāni dvandvayuddhāni | viṣayārtham deśārtham | daṇḍyatāṃ daṇḍayogyatām | paradāragamanādipāpakaraṇāt iti bhāvaḥ ||

asamarthās tad āyātāḥ prajābhiḥ saha dīnatām //

teṣām rājñām ||

note.p: rājavidyā rājaguhyam ityādinā gītādau rājavidyāśabdena vyavahārāt iti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: jñātvā rāghava rājānaḥ parāṃ nirduḥkhatāṃ gatāḥ //

note.p: rājaguhyam iti adhyātmavidyāyāḥ aparaṃ nāma ||

lg.l: asmād daśarathād rāma jāto 'dya tvam ihāvanau //

kākatālīyayogenety anena kriyākramādeḥ śaithilyaṃ sūcitam | kākatālīyena paramātmavicāraṇanimittabuddhiyogaḥ°ga⟨ṃ⟩[ḥ] | tāvat tu kriyākramādir avaśyam anuṣṭheyaḥ | tasyāpi leśataḥ taṃ praty upāyatvāt | na cac(ā)a tatraiva maṅktavyam | sadgurūpāsāder anyasya mukhyasyopāyasyāpi sattvāt ity alam ||

lg.l: yathābhūtam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃsāraṃ tanmayīṃ dhiyam /
parityajya paraṃ yānti nirālānā gajā iva //

note.p: yathābhūtam dṛṣṭvā yathāsti tathā dṛṣṭvā | tanmayīṃ saṃsāramayīm | param uttīrṇam śuddhacinmātratattvam | yānti tadrūpaṃ svātmānam anubhavanti ||

lg.l: dehamuktā mahātantur vinā jñānaṃ na naśyati //

note.p: anantāḥ īhāḥ bhāvābhāvarūpāḥ ceṣṭāḥ yasyāḥ | tādṛśī saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ saṃsārasaraṇiḥ | dehamuktā nāmanā[ma] mahātantuḥ dehamuktā mahātantuḥ | jñānam cinmātratattvajñānam ||
jñānarūpā yā yuktiḥ upāyaḥ | sa eva plavaḥ | tena ||
avahitayā buddhyā vinā śrotuṃ na śaknoṣīti bhāvaḥ ||

lg.l: cirāyāntar dahanty etā vinā yuktim anindita //

note.p: yuktim jñānākhyāṃ yuktim ||

lg.l: jñānayuktiṃ vinā kena sahyatāṃ yānti sādhuṣu //

note.p: kena kenānyenopāyena | na kenāpīty arthaḥ | atra tu bālavṛddhayoḥ°yo*ḥ* maricabhakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvena yojyam ||

lg.l: duḥkhacintā naraṃ mūḍhaṃ tṛṇam agniśikhā iva //

note.p: duḥkhadāyinyaḥ cintāḥ duḥkhacintāḥ | tāś ca bhogaviṣayāḥ jñeyāḥ ||

lg.l: na dahanti vanaṃ varṣadabdam°ṣada⟨gdh⟩[bd]am agniśikhā iva //

note.p: prājñaṃ kathaṃbhūtam | vijñātam anubhūtam | vijñānaṃ vijñānarūpam ātmatattvaṃ yena tam | ādhayaḥ cintāḥ | vanaṃ kathambhūtam | varṣantaḥ abdāḥab⟨dh⟩[d]āḥ meghāḥ yasya tat ||

ādhivyādhyoḥ parāvartaḥ°v(ā)ar° paunaḥpunyenāvṛttiḥ yasmin | tādṛśe kṣubhite bhāvābhāvākhyaḥ kṣobhayukte | na bhajyate harṣaśokavaśaṃ na yāti | saṃsāramarumārute kṣubhite satītisatī*t⟨ī⟩[i]* yojyam | kalpavṛkṣo 'pi mārute kṣubhite sati na bhajyate ||

lg.l: tattvaṃ jñātum ato yatnād dhīmān eva hi dhīmatā /

note.p: prāmāṇikaḥ pramāṇavaktā | prabuddhaḥ jñātaḥ | ātmā cinmātrarūpaḥ paramātmā yena | saḥ prabuddhātmā | praṇayānvitam yācñāsahitamyā⟨ñc⟩[cñ]ā° | etadvyatiriktas tu pṛṣṭaḥ viruddham eva kiṃcid brūyād iti bhāvaḥ ||
